1.content:
The loud echoing of the horn from the Cosquillas Island Ferry sounded shrilly in Erin's ears.

A muffled voice over the loudspeaker followed.

"Attention all passengers. We will be arriving at the Cosquillas Island docks in five minutes. Please return to your vehicles and prepare to
exit."

Turning away from the railing and the endless sea, Erin obediently strolled back to her Rav4 stationed directly behind her. Closing the door,
her eyes stared through the windshield at the silhouette of the island that was drawing closer by the second.

She smiled contently to herself. Her vacation had officially begun.

Well it wasn't quite a vacation. Just a yearly tradition. For the past five years, the intrepid reporter and photographer for the Mason City
Times newspaper returned to this island from May to August to work remotely. As her reputation had grown and her ability to meet
deadlines remained intact, she faced less and less blowback from her boss every time this time of the year arrived.

This island was her favorite spot in the entire world. A veritable paradise, where she was free to write and relax at her leisure. And have a
few laughs along the way.

The ferry bell began to ring furiously, as the ship reached the dock and was securely tied. Soon the gate fell and the engines of
various vehicles roared to life, eager to exit the ship's confines.

Erin soon followed suit and brought her vehicle onto the island. Taking a look at the sights around her, she decided to...............
1.title: Arrival

choices: She decided to take the offer and go into the stocks
No one took the offer, but she got chosen to go in the stocks
Someone else had volunteered for the stocks
No one took the offer, and someone else got chosen to go in the stocks
Her drink was ready, and she hurried out before someone was picked
11.content:
…………… head to get a cup of coffee from her favorite coffee shop, The Caffeinator Laughinator. Erin drove into town, ending up at The Caffeinator Laughinator within ten minutes. Upon exiting her car, Erin saw exactly what she had expected to: a girl tied up on a rack with a sign saying, ‘Tickle Me!’ posted in front of the rack. “Poor girl,” Erin thought to herself. “She must have not had enough money to pay for her drinks.” As this was one of her favorite places on the island, Erin knew the ins and outs of the coffee shop. Anyone who failed to pay for their coffee would be stripped to bra and panties and put out in the rack or in one of the other restraint devices at the Laughinator to be tickled by the public until the ‘debt’ had been paid. Having forgot her purse a few times when coming here, Erin knew what the rack was like firsthand. She walked up to the girl, seeing that only her feet and armpits were being tickled right now. Wanting to have some fun, Erin danced her fingers on the girl’s helpless belly for a few minutes before going inside.

Upon getting inside, Erin saw a long line, and got in the back. While waiting, she noted the stocks sitting right by the entrance and the other set by the waiting area where the coffee was delivered. A girl was inside each, getting tickled mercilessly by waiting customers. She waited until she got to the front, at which point the barista greeted her, “Hello, what would you like today?”

“I’ll have a venti cappuccino,” Erin ordered, and she soon paid for the drink. She then headed over to the second set of stocks, where a teenage girl was having her feet tickled. Having nothing else to do, Erin began tickling the girl’s armpits mercilessly, causing the girl to scream out in laughter. “Tickle, tickle, tickle!” she teased as her fingers tormented the girl’s exposed armpits. A few minutes later, an employee came by to let the girl out, so Erin ceased the tickling, and the girl was let out.

Erin expected that they would have someone else in the stocks soon, as there were usually several people who took advantage of the free coffee for tickling agreement, but the employee surprised everyone by announcing, “At the moment, we have no one else to put in the stocks, so we will be making a special offer. If anyone is willing to volunteer for the stocks, we will give them a gift card for $10 per minute they spend in the stocks, as well as an extra free drink coupon. This agreement will go as long as that person is willing to be locked in or until we have someone else who needs to occupy the stocks to pay off their order. If we get no volunteers, we will be forced to pick someone at random to go into the stocks. They will receive the same compensation for their time, with the exception of the extra free drink coupon. Do we have any volunteers? As always, the person who ends up in the stocks would need to strip down to clothing that exposes tickle spots.”

Erin thought about the offer for a minute. She was very ticklish, especially on her belly, but she did come here often, and $10 per minute in the stocks could go a long way to her coffee bill, not to mention the free drink. However, she wasn’t quite sure if she could actually take the tickling that she would be signing up for. After careful consideration…….
11.title: Coffee out in Public

choices: The girl was let out of the stocks, and it was time for someone new
113.content:
“I’ll do it,” another girl spoke up before Erin had a chance to volunteer herself, having reasoned that there were more rewards than potential consequences to getting in the stocks.

“Thank you for volunteering,” the employee happily responded. “Please follow me, and I will get you prepared. We will have her out in a minute or so.” The girl, apparently a little nervous at her decision, still followed the employee back into the back. True to her word, the employee brought the girl, now only clad in a bikini, back out in a minute and locked her up in the stocks. “Thank you for your patience. You are free to tickle Ms. Kari now. Remember that she is getting paid for getting tickled here now, so make it worth the time.”

Several patrons, including Erin, eagerly accepted the challenge, and surrounded Kari. Having been nervous that her own stomach would have been tickle tortured had she volunteered, Erin was now unrestrained in tickling Kari’s bare belly. The ticklish reporter ended up near the prisoner’s bellybutton, and she used all the techniques others had exploited on her to bring the stocked girl to hysterical laughter. “AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” was all Kari could scream out as her entire body was tickled. After a few minutes of tickle torturing Kari’s bellybutton, Erin stopped to give someone else a chance and saw that…
113.title: A Different Ticklish Volunteer

choices: A waterpark that had just opened
A costume party at a club
An abandoned warehouse where girls had disappeared
1131.content:
"One venti cappuccino for Erin!"

Erin turned around, her finger still deep in the girl's deep belly button. The barisa behind the counter had her order all ready, and Erin smiled. She gave a few flicks around the navel one last time, making sure to play with Kari's dangly belly button piercing before withdrawing her finger and stepping away; another woman immediately took Erin's spot, and Kari squealed as Erin's replacement tried to copy her techniques. Erin retrieved her drink, tipped her server, and sat down, pondering over her phone while sipping her cappuccino. She didn't need to start working on the clock for a couple of days, so while she was eager to explore the island and get a head start on her reporting, Erin figured she could also relax for the weekend. After double-checking her emails, bank account, and the weather (sunny for her whole visit!), Erin's drink was already half empty. She was beginning to consider getting up and finishing it on the road, when a hand tapped her on the shoulder.

The hand belonged to Kari! She had apparently finished her sentence, and had changed back into her casual clothes; a pair of blue jean shorts, and an orange tank top that all-but covered her belly; Erin saw the bump where the navel ring was decorated, and the bottom of its dangly attachment was poking out the bottom of the top. Kari also had very long hair tied into a neat dirty blonde ponytail, and looked to be in her late teens or early twenties. Erin looked over to the rack; it was empty, and the servers were again offering rewards to any volunteers, but there seemed to be few after what happened to Kari; however, the young girl had a cheerful smile on her face as she spoke to Erin.

"I don't think I've ever had my belly button tickled that well before! You're good!

Erin blushed; her own belly button was extremely ticklish, and truth be told she had learned most of her techniques from having them used on her before. But she didn't want to spill those beans.

"Oh, I've had... experience. Kari, was it?"

"Yes, and you are?"

"Erin. Nice to meet you!"

The two shook hands, and Kari sat down.

"So, what brings you to Cosquillas Island?"

"Well, I'm actually a reporter. I do some general stories about the island every year, and try to come back every once in a while to see what's different."

"Oh! That's so cool!"

Kari dug into her handbag and pulled out her smartphone, quickly searching something up and showing it to Erin.

"I have the perfect place for you to do research! Check it out! You might even get to use your belly tickling skills there!"

Amused by Kari's enthusiasm, Erin looked at the screen, and saw a link to:
1131.title: Her drink was ready

11311.content:
Erin scrolled through, looking at the impressive "Laugh 'n' Splash" park. She had indeed heard of it, but wasn't aware it would be open by the time she arrived. She browsed through a few pictures, while Kari gave a general description.

It had a tropical island theme to match Cosquillas' Island, and was bright and colourful. There were girls of all ages in swimsuits enjoying the park in its promotional pictures, and it had the usual features; a large wave pool, saunas, lots of slides, and a lazy river. But there was also, as was normal for the island, a tickling motif throughout. While not every attraction was designed to elicit laughs, Erin noted a few interesting options. A few girls sitting on top of inner tubes were floating through a thin cave with rotating feathers on spokes coming out the sides, laughing as their bare soles and ribs were brushed. Another woman was crossing her arms over her chest and looked like she was about to burst as she shot down a large drop slide with the sides entirely lined with feathers. A family was having light giggles as they sat in a pool of cleaner fish which nibbled on their toles and stomachs. And of course general tickling was present, with an unfortunate pair of sisters buried in the sand with tails shaped like mermaids and their mother tackling their tummies. An older woman was even giggling as an attractive male lifeguard was rubbing suntan lotion into her leg; the website listed the lotion as a signature product that could be purchased; Erin shuddered at the thought of it in her ticklish areas.

Kari took her phone back when Erin was finished.

"My friends and I are going there this afternoon! You should come!"

Erin gave it some thought. It would be quite the scoop to cover the park as a reporter, but she couldn't get away with carrying all her notes and cameras around in a bikini. Should she request entry as a plainclothes reporter, and just make observations? Or should she get into her swimsuit and enjoy the park as a guest, and write about it afterwards?
11311.title: A waterpark that had just opened

11312.content:
Erin took a look at the link. One of the city's major dance clubs, the "Great Giggle Gig" was hosting a special event that evening; attendees could come dressed in a costume, almost like a Halloween party. There was a dance floor complete with a DJ, a large drink bar, and even a family-friendly restaurant section for people not quite twenty one. There would also be a costume contest towards the end of the evening, with a "mystery prize" to be handed out.

Kari smiled. "Me and my friends will be going. You should come too!"

Erin gave it a thought, and it did sound interesting, both to cover as a reporter and to attend. But she hadn't exactly packed a costume for the trip; she asked Kari if it would be fine to get in without one, and the younger girl laughed.

"Good luck with that! You'd probably get called out as a party pooper, and tickled to death! Though, everyone's probably going to get a night's worth of tickling anyways."

Erin took a closer look at some more promotional pictures. Sure enough, there were people poking each other in the sides, scribbling on soles at the dining tables, and even a row of women getting belly shots more akin to belly raspberries. It seemed that almost everyone's costume bared something to be tickled; lots of sleeveless dresses, bare feet, and short shirts.

"I'll have to find one then. What will you and your friends be dressing as?"

"Oh, you'll see! But I'm sure you'll be happy with it!" Kari winked, and Erin laughed as she glanced down at the belly button she had finished tickling earlier.

The two left the Cafe over the pleas of a "volunteer" being loaded into the stocks, and Kari waved goodbye as she headed down the street. Erin, meanwhile, took a short drive a few blocks over to a big party store she knew sold costumes. The store was stocked full of goods for parties of any kind, from birthdays to weddings, and Erin had been there many times for various reasons, but had never really delved into the costume aisles. And when she got there, she wasn't disappointed.

The store was quite busy, as there were quite a few groups trying on costumes, apparently for the party that night. As Erin browsed the shelves for something fun, but nothing that would leave her too vulnerable, she observed some teen girls dressed as cheer leaders and rock stars spill out of a dressing room in a giggling mess; Erin surmised they had been tickling each other in their new outfits. She also observed nurses, angels, fairies, queens, and superheroes, and was tempted by each; everything looked entertaining. She eventually came to a standoff; in one hand, she held a mermaid costume, complete with a tail designed to walk in, and a seashell bra; Erin was worried it would reveal too much of her upper body, but she could probably fish for a flesh-coloured shirt to wear underneath for extra protection. In the other hand was something simple: a firefighter. It wasn't too creative, and Erin surmised it might get hot under the coat. But it would keep her covered, especially with the coat, pants, and helmet.
11312.title: A costume party at a club

11313.content:
Erin glanced at the phone, and saw a picture of a run-down warehouse taken at night; it looked unremarkable, simply a big building overlooking the sea with an empty parking lot and no activity.

"What's so special about it?"

"There's a rumor going around that young women that go there disappear and are never heard from again. The warehouse has been closed for years now, but people still went there to hang out or have fun, but the disappearances started only a few weeks ago."

Erin was perplexed, and scrolled through the article as Kari kept explaining. It alleged that up to a dozen girls had vanished, and official investigations hadn't turned up anything. This could be a breaking story, if she found anything new to go on. She looked at Kari.

"Why show me this?"

"Well, you said you're a reporter. I wanna get to the bottom of this mystery too! I can help you, if we go tonight!"

Erin sat back and sipped on her drink while she thought things over. Kari was young, but she knew the island and the story of the warehouse more than Erin did; she could be helpful. Then again, there may be other people on the island who could help as well. Should she agree with Kari and head down to investigate tonight, or take some time to ask around for rumours?
11313.title: An abandoned warehouse where girls had disappeared

choices: The sound of a vehicle driving up to the building
A voice behind her: "thanks for capturing another victim, Kari!"
113131.content:
"Let's go tonight. As long as you can promise to be careful."

Kari's face lit up with excitement, and she quickly agreed. The two made plans to meet at a small intersection and take a short hike to the warehouse later in the evening as the sun was setting. Erin was also excited, though she tried to remain professional. If something big was happening on the island, and she would be the one to crack it, then this could be the big break she was looking for! She spent the rest of her day settling in and doing errands, trying to keep an ear out for any whispers of the warehouse.

Later that night, Erin drove up and parked her car on the side of the road; Kari was there waiting for her, and seemed prepared just as Erin had asked. The two both wore skintight black clothes to avoid being seen, and each had a camera. Erin smirked as she saw the outline of Kari's belly button piercing protruding from the fabric of her shirt; when Kari saw her staring, she smiled back.

"I hope you don't blow our cover by tickling me"

"The thought never crossed my mind. Are you ready?"

The two crept over the hills through the trees until the warehouse was in sight; it looked exactly like it did in the photo, completely empty. Rather than go down and snoop around right away, the two stayed crouched down at the top of the hill. After almost an hour, the sun had set, and the building was dark. Both Kari and Erin were trying hard not to yawn, and Erin worked around some ideas in her head. She was tempted to go down and get a closer look under the cover of darkness; perhaps she could even get inside the building. But as she raised her hand to tap on Kari's shoulder, she suddenly heard something...
113131.title: Go that night

choices: Someone else volunteered for the rack
No one volunteered fast enough, and a selection had to be made
1132.content:
“Everyone, I have an announcement!” the same employee who had just put Kari in the stocks proclaimed. “The rack is now also open. If you were here a few minutes ago when the stocks got opened up, you heard that there is a chance to earn $10 a minute gift card and a free drink coupon if you volunteer to be locked on the rack. If no one volunteers, we will select a ticklee who will still receive the $10 a minute gift card, but not the free drink coupon, for their time on the rack. Whoever gets in will stay in until they have had enough or until we find someone new to take their place who owes us tickle time. Of course, that person will also need to get into clothing to expose their tickle spots, which we can provide if needed. Do we have any volunteers?”

Erin had to think about this one harder. The rack was certainly more of a risk, given that her belly would be stretched out and more open for tickling. However, she did still consider the benefits, specifically that $10 a minute gift card and a free drink on top of it. Eventually…
1132.title: Opportunity on the Rack

choices: She felt the tickling stop and her bonds loosen. She was being freed!
Something new started tickling her tummy, driving her into more hysterics
11321.content:
“I’ll go in,” Erin chose to volunteer.

“Thank you, please follow me,” the employee addressed her. “We will be back out in a minute or so.” The employee took Erin to the back and had her remove her clothing before handing her a blue bikini to put on. “Here you go; this should expose all your tickle spots quite effectively.” Once Erin had put on the bikini, the employee poked her and Erin giggled. “Oh, you’re quite a ticklish one, I see. That’s good; you’ll earn your $10 a minute. The gift card and coupon will be delivered to you after your time in the rack has ended. Would you like us to end your time on the rack when your drink is ready?”

“I think that would be good,” Erin affirmed.

“We can do that,” the employee stated. “Lastly, I need to know your name.”

“I’m Erin,” Erin informed her.

“Alright, Erin, time to get you on the rack,” the employee announced. “I’m sure that ticklish tummy of yours will get plenty of attention. If you need to get out, say ‘Apple’, and we will end your time there. I will have a stopwatch recording your time so we get you the proper reward. Let’s go.” Erin followed the employee out, and she laid down on the rack when they reached it. Soon enough, Erin found herself being stretched out before her arms and legs were tied up, preventing her from retracting her decision. “Everyone, Erin here is ready to be tickled on the rack. Remember, she is getting $10 for every minute she is on the rack, so let’s try to make her earn it!”

Like Kari had, Erin immediately was forced into laughter as a crowd began tickling her all over. In particular, Erin actually was able to feel her bare feet each being treated to one tickler, two hands on each of her armpits, two pairs of hands working over her ribs, each of her knees being squeezed by a hand, and six hands working over her extremely sensitive stomach. “AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Erin was not able to do anything but laugh as she was overwhelmed by all the tickling sensations. Soon enough, the ticklish reporter felt people switching out, and the intensity lessened just a little bit, enough for Erin to potentially say the magic word that could get her out. She thought about it for a few seconds and then…
11321.title: Racked and Tickled

choices: “No, your drink is done, so that’s why you got freed.”
113211.content:
Suddenly, Erin felt the tickling stop, and her arms and legs began to be loosened. The employee who had bound her was standing there, untying her. As Erin started to feel freedom in her limbs, the employee declared to her, “Well, you’ve got a gift card for $40 for here, as well as the free drink card. I’ve got it back with the rest of your things. Here, I’ll help you up, and we can go back and get it for you.”

The employee helped Erin get up and guided her back to her things. The reporter put her clothes back on and accepted the gift card and the coupon. Still trying to remember how she actually got freed through all the laughter, Erin questioned, “Hey, did I say ‘Apple’, or was I let out for some other reason?”

The employee smiled before responding,
113211.title: Not Racked Anymore

1132112.content:
“No, your drink is done, so that’s why you got freed,” the employee explained to Erin. “Although, I have to say that I think you’d have said ‘Apple’ very soon if your drink hadn’t been done. You sure looked fun to tickle, and those people were having a lot of fun tickling you. Anyways, we should go get your coffee. Thank you for volunteering!”

“Yes, I’m also a little glad I volunteered,” Erin admitted. “It was a little fun for me, even though it was like being tickle tortured. Thanks for getting me out so I could get my coffee.” Erin headed out of the back and got her coffee before she saw a new victim on the rack. This woman, who looked like she was in her early thirties, seemed to have very ticklish armpits and feet, as this was where the ticklers were concentrating. The reporter watched her for a couple minutes before leaving with her coffee and heading to…
1132112.title: Leaving The Caffeinator Laughinator

choices: Had enough money to pay and left for her vacation home
Didn't have enough money to pay and has to go to the underground tickling area
Didn't have enough money to pay and is sent to be put on a tickling rack
11321122.content:
Erin decided to go to some shopping of general groceries and such before she headed to her wonderful vacation home.

Much like the café, the supermarkets on the island also had similar rules where if you couldn't pay for your shopping you either had to be trickled to pay it or give it back and be tickler a little bit for wasting time. The supermarket that Erin went to had a rule of every $1 was equivalent to around 2 and a half minutes in the trickling stocks. Some supermarkets had people specially trained to tickle the ones who don't pay, while others had stocks out in the open to allow the public to tickle them.

Erin chose to go with the closet supermarket to the café, which was also one of her favourites as it had everything she needed. However this supermarket had a mixture between both staff and the local people who tickle those who don't pay or waste time.

As Erin walked into the massive supermarket she immediately saw tickling racks on her left, five in total, three of them which had employees mercilessly tickling those who didn't want to pay. Each rack was currently filled, however if all of the racks are filled and you can't pay you are taken to somewhere else special in the shop underground.

Erin had been extra careful not to go to such a place due to her ticklish nature but it was actually possible to book being tickled in this underground area of the shop, which always had intrigued Erin.

After browsing for awhile and finally collecting all that she needed for her vacation home Erin...
11321122.title: The supermarket

113211223.content:
Erin didn’t need too many things; just a few groceries and snacks to last her through her vacation. The island had many fun restaurants to dine at anyways. With just a basketful of items, she made her way to the self-checkout, scanned her items, tapped her credit card, and headed out.

“Excuse me Miss, could you please come back?”

Erin was startled a bit, and turned around; a young employee was standing at the machine she had just used, and politely waving her over. The employee was in her late teens, and had bright red hair tied into two pigtails running down her back. Her complexion was very pale, save for the freckles on her face, and her nametag red "Brooke". Erin walked back to see what was the trouble, a little anxious in the back of her mind.

“It seems your card was declined, could you try again?”

Erin looked at the screen, and sure enough, it had a “Declined” notice. Erin tapped her card again. Nothing. Now a little worried, and noticing Brooke trying to hide a grin, Erin tried inserting her card. Nothing.

“This can’t be happening. I just got paid before I left, I…”

“Ma’am, you do know what happens when you can’t pay for groceries here”

“Yes, but I assure you, I HAVE money!”

Erin was frantic now, and pulled out her phone to check her balance. As she turned it on, however, her recent email notifications showed up on the screen… including one from her bank. The subject of the e-mail read “Our dearest apologies. All payments delayed due to system maintenance.” Brooke, reading over her shoulder, smiled. Erin was of course shocked as the worker grabbed her by the shoulder and led her to one of the racks; she wouldn’t try to fight it, as she knew the punishment, but was incredibly anxious about the tickling that lie ahead. At this rate, she wouldn’t make it to the hotel!

Brooke helped Erin into the rack, spreading her arms above her head and tying her legs together, overall giving her a “Y-shape”. With her arms stretched like so, Erin’s shirt popped out of her pants, and came up to barely expose an inch of her stomach. Her ultra-ticklish belly button was still hidden, which Erin hoped would last. She did expect to get tickled on this island, but had hoped it wouldn’t be through incidents as clumsy as this.

“Now, since it was a card getting declined, and not you trying to steal stuff, I’ll be nice and leave you to the public, rather than have our professionals take care of you. Your total came to $23.94, which rounds to 24 minutes in the rack; I’ll come and get you when you’re finished!”

Erin sighed as Brooke walked off. She turned her neck and looked at the three full racks to her left. One was occupied by a girl in her late teens, with dyed hair and a few tattoos and piercings. She was being tickled across her armpits and belly by a group of store workers, hinting to Erin she had been caught stealing. Erin winced as one employee brought an electric toothbrush into the girl’s pierced belly button, using the metal vibrations to send the girl into hysterics. Next over was a woman who looked to be in her late 30s; she had very tanned skin and was dressed like a typical tourist, except her floral shirt had been unbuttoned and a man was scurrying his fingers across her belly. The man was also dressed for vacation, and Erin saw two wallets sticking out of his back pockets; had he taken his wife’s wallet just to get this opportunity? Lastly, there was a young girl, maybe only nine years old. She wasn’t as tied down as the others were, with only her legs trapped, and she was in between an older woman and a store employee. The employee was holding a large feather in one hand, and a bag of candy in the other; it appeared the girl had accidentally taken the bag of candy without paying for it. The tickling was light and gentle, and Erin surmised it was just a way for the girl to learn a lesson, though she winced when the girl’s mother slipped up her shirt a tiny bit and dragged a feather across the girl’s outie belly button.

Erin was too busy watching the others to notice someone come up to her and poke her in the side. She yelped, and looked down to see…
113211223.title: Didn't have enough money to pay and is sent...

choices: Rolled up Erin's shirt to expose her tummy
Pushed their mother into the empty rack next to Erin
1132112231.content:
“Hey Erin!”

The finger retracted from her side, and withdrew; Erin looked to see an attractive young woman in front of her. Her hair was dark brown and tied into a very long ponytail behind her, and she was wearing a zipped-up jacket and a pair of leggings. Beside her were two identical twin ten-year old girls, both with dirty blonde ponytails. Both wore crop tops, and leggings pulled up past their navels; only a few inches of skin were showing. While their mother’s face was very warm and friendly, the girls had more mischievous smiles.

“Oh, hello Jackie! Awe, and these must be Brittany and Bethany! I haven’t seen you since you were babies!”

Jackie had been a family friend of Erin’s for a very long time, and looked incredibly good even in her mid-thirties with twins. She lived in the continental USA, and Erin had bugged her to come out to the Island for a vacation; their surprise appearance here today meant they made it this summer!

“It’s lovely to see you Erin! We finally decided to take a trip to this island; the girls couldn’t wait! We only just arrived; we’re on our way to the Hotel Cosquillas right now!”

“Yeah, but mom won’t let us tickle anyone yet” piped up one of the twins.

“Oh honey, I told you, not until we get to the hotel and drop off our stuff off”, said Jessica, before turning back to Erin. “I guess they just love tickling! They wanted us to all have our belly buttons exposed for tickles, but I told them not until we’re settled in and I’ve figured out how the island all works! I wanted to go to Spain this year, but they convinced me otherwise.

“We tickled her!” said both twins, excitedly at the same time.

Erin laughed at the thought of the girls tickling their mother. She knew Jackie was very fit, but incredibly sensitive all over, especially on her belly.
“Did you know your mom’s weakness is raspberries in her belly button?” teased Erin.

The twin’s eyes went wide and they grinned at each other, and a flustered Jackie poked Erin in the side again.

“Hey! Don’t go getting me in trouble! It looks like you’re in trouble enough!”

“No, please don’t tickle me, Jackie! I’m almost finished! I’m sorry!”

“Hey girls, it looks like we might have some fun before we get to our hotel room! Want to help me out!”

The twins whispered at each other, grinned, and…
1132112231.title: A friend of hers

choices: She yelled out ‘Apple’ to stop the tickling
A new tummy tickling tool prevented her from getting the word out
113212.content:
As Erin was busy laughing from all the fingers tickling her, she felt something new on her belly that made her stomach churn: a feather duster. “NOHOHOHOHOHO!” she protested the addition of the cleaning tool. “NAHAHAHAHAHAHAT THAHAHAHAT!” What made this even worse was that four hands were still tickling all over her midriff; the duster covering the center just made it worse.

“Are you ticklish there?” someone in the crowd teased. “We needed to clean this tummy, make sure there’s no dust left on it. Don’t worry; once we make sure this tummy is all nice and clean, we’ll rethink the feather duster.”

This did little to comfort Erin, who was trying to squirm away from the tickles and out of her bonds desperately. “PLEHEHEHESE STAHAHAHAP!” she pleaded. “AHAHAHAHAHA!”

“Umm, no, not yet,” another customer joined in. “You are way too ticklish for us to let up on this right now, and your tummy isn’t cleaned up yet, anyway.”

“AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” The tickling on Erin’s most ticklish spot was becoming exhausting, and she soon decided to just laugh until she was ready to say her release word. “AHAHAHAHAHA!”

Five minutes of the tickle torturing persisted, and Erin decided that something had to be done.
113212.title: A Ticklish Cleaning

choices: Erin finally realized she had enough breath to yell out ‘Apple!’
1132122.content:
As Erin was about to give in and say ‘Apple’, she felt something new on her bare belly. “AHAHAHAHAHAHA!” she laughed out as she felt vibrating bristles attacking her ticklish tummy. It tickled so much that despite how much she wanted to say ‘Apple’, there was no way she would be able to get it out. All she could do now was laugh as her fellow coffee shop customers reveled in tickling her.

“Tickle, tickle, tickle!” one of Erin’s ticklers teased her, making sure to whisper it right into her ear so she could hear it. “You’re so ticklish on that ticklish tummy of yours. I bet you wish you could get that tickly toothbrush off of your belly right now, but that’s not going to happen. We’re just going to tickle…. and tickle… and tickle you until you give in and say ‘Apple’ for us.

Oh, how Erin wanted to give in and say ‘Apple’. But that was not anything close to what was coming out of her mouth right now. All that was coming out was, “AHAHAHAHA EHEHEHEHE AHAHAHAHA!” Some extra squeals were added to her normal laughter when the toothbrush, which was journeying around her midriff, hit an especially sensitive spot. This was often quickly followed up by other ticklers volunteering to tickle that spot with their fingers, keeping Erin in hysterics. Erin completely lost it when the toothbrush entered her bellybutton, “NOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHO! AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAEHEHEHEHEHEHA!” Realizing that this was by far the best spot on her, the ticklers opted to keep the toothbrush in Erin’s navel while fingers wiggled around every other spot on her sensitive stomach.

“Are we hitting your tickle button now?” Erin heard the teasing whispers return to her ear. “That little toothbrush in your tickle button seems like it’s driving you completely crazy. Just say ‘Apple’ and we’ll let you go. If you can, tickle toy.”

“AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Erin definitely could not get any comprehensible words out, and she realized that she had just been turned into a tickle toy. Knowing that there was nothing she could do, as she did not have the breath to say ‘Apple’, Erin just laid back and took the tickle torture. After ten minutes of this,
1132122.title: New Tickle Torture Tool

choices: Erin doesn’t last a minute under the tickle torture
Erin goes longer than a minute
11321222.content:
All of a sudden, an exhausted Erin noticed that the tickling had stopped, and she could breathe again. Standing over her was the employee who had originally locked her in the rack. “Well, well, well, I think we’ve found a quite ticklish victim in this rack,” the employee announced. “I decided that you’re so ticklish that we had to give you a break; otherwise, it would have been just cruel. Now Erin, I know what you’re probably thinking: are you getting off the rack? And the answer to that is a big NO. We won’t even let you go if you say ‘Apple’ right now.” At that, Erin sort of panicked, but she decided to wait and see what was next. “You are so ticklish that you’ve qualified for our bonus reward. For the rest of your time here, you’ll get $20 a minute, and for every 10 minutes extra you last, you’ll get another free drink coupon. And if you last long enough, I’m not going to tell you how long, you’ll get your picture up on the wall as the endurance champion here. You’ll be tickled on your most ticklish spot, your tummy, by five of our professional ticklers, and the public will be able to continue tickling you everywhere else. Once they start tickling you, you can say ‘Apple’ again to stop the tickling. Out of respect for allowing you to get the reward, I will no longer stop the tickling because your coffee is ready. I’ll just make sure it’s still hot when you get done. Are you ready?”

“I- I guess so,” Erin responded, and she saw five store employees coming over to her. One straddled her hips and placed her fingers right near her bellybutton, and the other four ticklers split into two groups on opposite sides of her stomach. Of course,

“Remember that Erin’s earning $20 a minute here, so make it worth it,” the employee proclaimed. “Begin!”

“AHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Erin screamed out as the tickling started all over her body. Without a doubt, the tickling on her midriff was the worst, and these store employees definitely knew what they were doing.
11321222.title: Small Break

Erin makes it past ten minutes of tickle torture
113212222.content:
The only good thing about five professionals tickling Erin’s super ticklish stomach was that in a few seconds, she momentarily forgot everything but the tickling, even her safe word. While she was racking her brain, trying to remember it, all that showed on the outside was her hysterical laughter. Erin’s memory quickly recovered her safe word, but at the same time that she recalled that, she also remembered the reward for enduring the tickling, and she refused to stop.

Soon enough, teases trickled in from the crowd, specifically the people tickling her upper body near her head, “Ooh, someone’s so ticklish. How did she get put on the tickle rack? When is she going to give up? She’s way too ticklish to be doing this for too long.”

Of course, she did not realize it at the time, but the ticklee easily made it past a minute without saying the safe word.
113212222.title: Basic Endurance: Achieved

Erin just got her free drink coupons and payment
1132122222.content:
“Congratulations, Erin!” Erin just barely heard the voice of the employee who had forced her into this challenge. “You’ve lasted a whole ten minutes so far. Of course, you know what this means: you get a free drink coupon! It also means that the next ten minutes will be much more difficult. Go at her!”

“AHAHAHAHA AHAHAHAHAHA!” Erin had been tickled so much at this point that all she could do was laugh. She strained her voice to laugh harder when the employees began blowing raspberries on her bare belly. Trying to get out and momentarily slipping into silent laughter, Erin endured the torturous raspberries in her navel until she finally gave in and managed to get out the safe word.
1132122222.title: Free Drink Coupon: Achieved

Sure, but I want to tickle YOU!
11321222221.content:
A bell went off, and the audience in the cafe cheered, not that Erin could hear them. In fact, she remained in the rack for another two minutes; if she had been able to pay attention, she would have noticed the very worried looks on the employees' faces, as they scrambled to get her to crack. But after the first extra minute, they seemed to give up, and the tickling, licking, and raspberries slowed down enough for Erin to sputter out "apple".

Slowly regaining her senses, she took in the crowd of people watching and clapping, as two of her ticklers whispered to each other. One of them, who appeared as a high school student with black curly hair, sheepishly looked down and went into the back of the store, while the other four got to taking Erin's restraints off. There seemed to be a diverse mix of ticklers on her; a latina woman, a short young girl with long wavy brown hair, a redhead with a pixie cut who looked like a university student, and a black woman with a braided ponytail. All four of them, including the enthusiastic brunette who pushed her into the racks to begin with, looked worried, but had fake smiles on their faces as they let Erin out. Erin wondered what the hassle was, after all they'd had their turn of tickling, and then the door to the back swung open. The earlier girl returned along with a woman who looked in her mid-thirties; unlike the employees, she was dressed very prim and proper, with her blonde hair tied up into a tight red bun and horned-rimmed glasses resting on her nose. From her pantsuit and makeup, Erin deduced she must be the store manager; her nametag read "Mallory".

"Well then, Erin, is it? Oh no, honey, don't worry about responding just yet, catch your breath."

Erin nodded, and Mallory took her to the back, followed by the five ticklers, as a new wave of employees came out to resume business. Erin expected to be taken to the room where her belongings were, but instead, she was directed into an elevator. The seven women walked in, and Mallory hit a button to descend.

"It appears, you've broken our record without saying the safe word! A marvelous feat, I'm sure. I hope you enjoy your free drinks, but there's something else I'd like you to enjoy as well.. You see, my employees might be great ticklers, but today they failed, and must be... disciplined."

Erin raised an eyebrow, and looked at her five tormentors, who were huddled together with their heads down. The elevator stopped, and Erin was let out into a room that she immediately deduced to be the not-so-secret torture chamber. There were many sets of stocks and tools lining the large underground space, though you couldn't tell it was underground due to the bright white walls and flood lighting. Mallory filled her in.

"This room is where we send anyone with very large debts, or anyone who needs to be punished. Not something we'd let the public upstairs take care of. Now, as a part of your record-breaking reward, you do get to tickle any girls here you like. Does anyone suit your fancy?"

Erin looked back at the five women; the curly-haired Brie, the latina Maria, the brunette Taylor, the redhead Lara, and the black Giselle. She was eager for revenge, but what should she do?
11321222221.title: Erin had broken the record for longest tickling

11321222222.content:
The tickling finally stopped, as the employees ushered the customers away. Erin remained on the rack panting for air, even after one of the workers removed her restraints. Looking down at her poor belly, Erin could see how red it was from all the tickling. Her belly button in particular was still tingling. As the barista led the exhausted reporter to the back room, where she saw her clothes and belongings neatly folded, with her drink rewards sitting next to them. She would definitely have to remember to use them in the future to make this all worth it. As she packed her things and walked back out to the cafe's dining area, she saw the racks had already been filled. Volunteer or victim, she didn't know, but to get her just deserts, she walked to the poor girl, lifted her shirt up, and blew a single, large raspberry on the girl's tummy.

As she left the cafe, she could hear the new ticklee pleading for the other customers not to repeat what they saw, to no avail. Erin closed the door behind her, dampening the sound of zerberts and laughter, as she looked up into the sky. She still had a lot of time left in her day, but all the tickling in the cafe had still left her feeling exhausted. She wouldn't be able to make it to her house without falling asleep at this rate, but fortunately, there were places near the downtown area where she could afford a quick nap. The beachfront area was very close; lined with palm trees and with plenty of public beach chairs, there would no doubt be a nice sandy place for her to relax and watch the waves. Alternatively, there was also the park; it had many winding pathways and shady trees, perfect for finding secluded silent areas.
11321222222.title: Erin just got her free drink coupons and payment

Luckily for Erin a debtor enters the shoppe
11323.content:
Erin was so lost starring at Kari and weighing her decision that she hadn't realize the time for volunteering had passed.

The employee had casually strolled up to Erin. Placing a hand on Erin's shoulder the employee smiled slyly and announced, “You have been chosen. If you will please follow me I'll escort you to the changing room”. Erin snapped out of her trance and immediately realized what was going on. Butterfly's filled her stomach and she swallowed hard.

With great trepidation she followed the employee to a small room. On one wall was a changing mirror and a built in bench was just opposite. The young girl handed a vacuum packed bag to Erin, “I'll be right out here when your ready” she said all to giggly.

Erin broke the seal on the plastic bag to reveal a two piece pink silk bikini. When she removed her ticklee attire, Erin could not help but notice the bikini looked more like something you would see in an anime or manga. She watched herself in the mirror fiddling with the material in a vein attempt to make it “fit”. The top was nothing more than a few strings with a couple of tiny triangles that barely covered her perky nipples. The bottom wasn't any better. Thin strips that tied over each hip held what amounted to a strip of floss running down between her shapely cheeks and connecting in front to a another triangular piece of silk made to cover no more than the bump that was her clit. After trying everything she could to force the material to cover more of her nubile body, especially her smoothly shaven lips, Erin nervously cracked the door.

The employee that had been waiting for her handed her a pair of pink flip flops, “Put these on, we wouldn't want those pretty feet of yours to get dirty.” Erin heard the girls teasing tone and it did nothing to help alleviate her apprehensiveness. She slid the strap between her pedicured toes and stepped out of the room.

The young girl led Erin back out and stopped at the rack.

“Thank you for volunteering,” the employee happily responded. “Please follow me, and I will get you prepared. Erin beamed as she could see the girl was clearly not endowed with any pubic hair. The pink bikini was see-through to her delight. “Thank you for your patience. You are free to tickle Ms. Kari now. Remember that she is getting paid for getting tickled here now, so make it worth the time.”

Several patrons, including Erin, eagerly accepted the challenge, and surrounded Kari. Having been nervous that her own stomach would have been tickle tortured had she volunteered, Erin was now unrestrained in tickling Kari’s bare belly. The ticklish reporter ended up near the prisoner’s bellybutton, and she used all the techniques others had exploited on her to bring the stocked girl to hysterical laughter. “AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” was all Kari could scream out as her entire body was tickled. After a few minutes of tickle torturing Kari’s bellybutton, Erin stopped to give someone else a chance and saw that the employee had returned.

Erin hoped the girl would continue to be tickled. The employee handed her a cup of joe that brought relief to her face. She drank it happily as the poor girl screamed some more. Finishing it quickly, Erin decided to return to the girl's open navel and ribcage. The result was the poor girl thrashing even more. Erin loved this feeling, her own breasts were getting quite pointy. And she could feel that familiar tingling deep between her thighs. However the girl couldn't take much and it was now time for someone new. The girl had to be helped up by the two female staff. "Any new volunteers?"

Five minutes, it is Erin who is bound in the stocks. “Folks, I have just been informed that the manager is offering a special offer. A months supply of free coffee for our friend Erin here, if she can make twenty minutes! And a 40% discount to anyone who can break her in that time! No tag teaming of course, so staff and one person only per turn!”

Erin forced herself to stay calm. A month free of coffee was an amazing deal. But when Kari approached with the most sinister grin available, hope seemed faint. “Let’s begin!” Erin almost lost control on the spot. Kari was immensely skilled and her technique on her belly button was actually putting pressure on her bladder. 11331.title: Erin volunteers

114.content:
Nobody raised their voice, and the staff of the shop were starting to grow a little impatient. After all, the racks needed to be filled by someone! Sure enough, the announcement was updated as one of the baristas called to the restaurant goers.

“All right, we don’t have any volunteers, which is unfortunate! That means it will be a random draw! We would like to ask all the ladies in the café to please come up and select a straw from this cup! Now don’t worry, as this isn’t voluntary, there will be plenty of compensation for whoever is chosen.”

The barista held out a venti cup with several straws. Nervously, the girls in the café stood up. They all looked antsy in one way or another; some looked desperate not to be tickled, others like they wouldn’t mind it but didn’t want to be in the spotlight. They all knew, however, that someone had to be in the racks; that was what the café was known for, and why they were there!

Erin knew this too, and was getting increasingly worried. She didn’t want to be tickled this early into her trip, but a sinking feeling was getting to her. She looked around the café and saw about a dozen other girls, giving her less than a 10% chance of a random selection. Not great, but not terrible. Erin stood up and joined the line, taking in the other possible victims. If not her, she’d at least have some fun getting in a few more tickles before she had to be on her way.

There was a young, but very tall and very fit, woman wearing a sports bra and leggings; she looked like she hadn’t ordered a coffee, but a cool drink after a morning full of exercise. Her brown hair was tied back in a slick ponytail, and Erin took note of her smooth tanned abs. She wore sneakers, though Erin was sure if she landed in the rack they wouldn’t last long.

Erin also saw a young metalhead girl, in her late teens by the looks of things. She had bright blue hair with a few black streaks, and had piercings all on her eyebrows, nose, and ears. She wore baggy ripped jeans and a ripped shirt to match, showing off a great portion of her sides. Erin couldn’t quite see the girl’s navel, but did see the tip of a dangly piercing poking out the bottom of the punk’s top. She looked very nervous to be there, Erin thought to herself.

The last girl to pick a straw before Erin was a woman who was practically dragged to the front of the café by two children, ostensibly her sons. The mother had a short brown bob-cut, and was dressed conservatively: a buttoned up shirt tucked into her jeans under a belt. Her children clearly wanted to see her tickled more than she did, and she reluctantly grabbed a straw.

The barista smiled.

“All right, please hold your straw up and blow into it! The one with a feather inside will be our next volunteer for the stocks!”

Erin blew into her straw, and to her relief, nothing came out. She was safe! She heard the voices in the café make noise in anticipation, however, and turned around. One of the girls she had taken note of was holding a straw in one hand, and a feather in the other!

Who was the unfortunate victim?

12.content:
……………..travel to her summer residence to unwind. It'd been a long week and an even longer month. Erin was exhausted from
the long journey and was eager to stretch her legs a bit.

Taking a right at the first traffic light, she let her foot onto the gas pedal and brought her car speeding along the winding coastal
road. The mountainous island sported various houses that sprouted up along the hillside, while also containing various small
towns that were densely populated.

Passing through a corridor with various shops and buildings flanking either side, Erin took another right hand turn that led
her up a steep narrow road. At the end of this road was her cottage, a small, isolated Cape Cod that was surrounded by only
trees and silence. Up there, Erin could feel as if she had the entire island to herself.

The wheels of the Rav4 began to make a grinding sound as the smooth pavement of the road suddenly turned to gravel. This
was the indicator that she was making her final approach to the cottage.

Ahead the gravel road split into a fork, with Erin's home standing lazily to the left side and the cottage of her neighbor, the
Cornwalls, off to the right.

Bringing her vehicle in front of the cottage doorway, Erin switched off the engine and gazed pleasantly at the ivy covered walls.

She removed her luggage and entered the structure.

The inside carried a musty smell familiar to all places that have been unoccupied for a period of time. Erin opened a few of the
windows to allow sunlight and fresh air through, before heading upstairs to unpack.

Opening the bedroom windows, Erin took almost no time at all to unpack. Once everything was situated she decided to...…..
12.title: Head to her house

choices: A call from inside the house
121.content:
……….pay a visit to the Cornwalls.

The Cornwall family had been residents of Cosquillas Island for the past fifteen years by the time Erin took up her summer
residence. The matriarch of the family, Melissa, was in the final year of her thirties, nearly a decade older than Erin, but
remained one of Erin's closest friends.

She was also the most extraordinary woman Erin had ever met.

A mother at age 19, Melissa managed to finish a dual undergraduate degree in the areas of Art History and Art Restoration from
Cambridge University in her native England. Eager to distance herself from the father of her daughter, Melissa had taken a
position at the Cosquillas Island Museum where she worked as a curator. Even with that full time job and supporting her then
infant daughter, Melissa took evening courses online and completed an MBA, while also investing her money in the stock market.

With several successful investments and a business education, Melissa broke from the museum and began her own business
on the island: Cornwall Restoration and Antiques.

Beginning as a shop that restored antique furniture and artwork, the business soon grew into the primary collector of rare
artwork and antiques on Cosquillas Island. With rising profits from the business and continued wise investing, the single
mother soon gathered a sizeable fortune, with which she purchased the sensible cottage that sat across from Erin's and
funded her daughter's education.

Erin first met the intrepid Englishwoman at a local yoga class, where they bonded over their mutual love of art and became
inseparable friends.

As Erin exited her cottage, she looked across the way to the Cornwall house, where three vehicles sat in the driveway. No
doubt Melissa was home, as was her daughter, Catherine, now a twenty year old college student, who was home for her
summer vacation.

The third vehicle at the end of the driveway, a black sedan plastered with bumper stickers and peace signs, indicated that
Melissa's niece, Sarah, was also visiting for the summer from England.

Erin enjoyed a friendly relationship with both Catherine and Sarah, so the sight of those two vehicle brought a greater smile
to the young reporter's face.

As she climbed the small stairwell to the front door, Erin could hear sounds from inside the house.

Ringing the doorbell, Erin was soon greeted by...……......….....

……………….the pale face of Sarah Cornwall.

Erin smirked at the sight of Melissa's twenty year old niece. The girl was such a stark contrast with her cousin Catherine, that it
was often difficult to tell the two were related.

Catherine was very much like her mother, well-dressed, prim and proper, while Sarah was always dressed like a punk rocker. As
she stood in the doorway, Erin noted the baggy jeans and V-neck black sweater that the twenty year old sported, in spite of
the warm early summer weather. Sarah's dark hair hung listlessly around her face, while her dark eyes peered through at
Erin.

Sarah smiled broadly upon seeing Erin.

"Hey Ms. Packard!"

She gave Erin an eager hug which Erin promptly returned.

"Good to see you, Sarah," Erin said releasing her, "when'd you get here for the summer?"

"Hahahahehehehehehhshhahahahehehehahahahahahahahah!"

Her bare feet are propped on the coffee table in front of the armchair, where her daughter, Catherine, is kneeling and tickling her mother's feet.
