“Wow, that must tickle a lot, Mom,” Catherine commented. “I mean, she barely started tickling you, and you’re just laughing a ton.”

“If I may,” Erin addressed Catherine and Sarah, “what did Melissa do to deserve this tickling?”

“Well, we were tickling Sarah for fun, and all of a sudden, Mom pinned me down and started tickling me!” Catherine proclaimed, clearly having been upset at this at the time. “Sarah joined in, but I thought that was deserved, since I’d been tickling her earlier, but we couldn’t let Mom get away with it. When she finally let me up, Sarah and I brought her over here, and then we started tickling her like she had to us.”

“Oh, I see.” Erin understood the tickling dynamic of the family. More than once, hse had been on the receiving end of tickling from each of the three. Of course, she also had the chance to tickle all of them before, so it was a mutual dynamic.

“PLEHEHEHEHEHEHESE LEHEHEHEHEHT MEHEHEHEHEHE OHOHOHOHOHOUT!” Melissa pleaded through her laughter as a friendly conversation between Erin and the girls ensued.

Eventually, though…
121331.title: Melissa's Ticklish Ribs

1213311.content:
“Hey, Ms. Packard, do you want to help us get my mom?” Catherine asked Erin. “I think her tummy could use some more tickles.”

“Well, I suppose I could help,” Erin smiled as she agreed. “That belly does look like it needs some attention.”

“No, don’t you DAHAHAHAHAHAHARE!” Melissa tried to protest before breaking out into laughter as Sarah restarted her tickling of her aunt’s ribs. “STAHAHAHAHAHAHAP!” Erin quickly joined in, finding that as usual, Melissa’s tummy was very, very ticklish. She was aware from previous experiences that Melissa’s entire midsection was one large weak spot, often taken advantage of in teams of two to four hands. “EHEHEHEHEHEHEHERIHIHIHIHIHIN! THEHEHEHEHEHEY’LL AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Melissa’s attempt at a warning was cut off as Erin dipped a finger into her bellybutton and Sarah moved down to help tickle her aunt’s stomach. “NOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHO!”

“Oh, it’s really nice to see you, Melissa,” Erin declared to the ticklee. “I was wondering if you were still as ticklish as ever, and I’ve gotten an answer just an hour into my vacation here. Thanks!”

“Ms. Packard, if you ever want to test whether Mom is ticklish or not, just ask us to hold her down,” Catherine snidely commented. “We’ll be more than happy to hold her down so you can test her.”

“I’ll keep that in mind,” Erin smiled as her finger dipped in and out of her friend’s navel. “Melissa, isn’t that nice? Your daughter and niece are going to help me test your ticklishness whenever I want! You have raised them so well. And because of that, I get to give tickles to you! Tickle, tickle, tickle, Melissa!”

Sarah and Erin continued to tickle Melissa’s belly for another five minutes before one of the ticklers decided that a change was in order. To the surprise of Catherine and Melissa…
1213311.title: Sarah and Catherine asked Erin to help tickle M...

choices: Melissa and Catherine decided to join in
Sarah finally gave her some mercy
12133111.content:
Sarah turned against her fellow tickler and suddenly tickled her sides. Erin shrieked in response and brought her hands away from Melissa’s tummy to try and protect her own, but it was too late. Like Melissa, Erin was extremely ticklish on her stomach, so it didn’t take much for Sarah to gain an advantage. Before long, Erin was on the ground, laughing hysterically and trying to squirm away from her new tickler.

“Oh, is Ms. Packard still ticklish?” Sarah teased as she tickled through Erin’s shirt.

“STAHAHAHAHAHAHAP!” Not really hearing what Sarah had to say, Erin’s only concern was getting mercy from her friend’s niece. “NAHAHAHAHAHAHAT THEHEHEHERE!”

However, given Erin’s situation and the previous retribution of tickles that had been given to Melissa, Sarah was in no mood to give her mercy. It didn’t take long before Sarah decided to torture Erin more effectively, pulling up her shirt and tickling her bare belly. Pretty soon, Erin was quite helpless, flailing a little to try and get the tickling to stop, but otherwise, just laughing.

While Erin was laying on the ground, hoping for the tickling to stop…
12133111.title: Erin's Ticklish Tummy

choices: “Hmm, not yet. You need more tickling.”
121331111.content:
Having already been rendered helpless by Sarah’s ferocious tickle attack on her stomach, Erin couldn’t do anything but laugh louder as she felt four more hands come and start to tickle her. From previous experience, she knew that Melissa had joined in on her bare belly, while Catherine quickly removed her shoes and socks and went after her feet. “NOHOHOHOHOHO!” Erin protested the increased tickling. “HEHEHEHEHEHELP!”

“But we are helping,” Melissa happily pointed out. “Sarah looked like she wanted us to join in on tickling you, and we’re doing exactly that.”

“HEHEHEHEHEHELP MEHEHEHEHEHEHE!” Erin pleaded, severely weakned by all the tickling.

“Well, I suppose we’re helping you laugh,” Catherine joked from Erin’s feet. “That can be something good for you.”

“Cat, as nice as that is, we’re not really helping Erin here,” Melissa rebuked the comment. “Erin, we are tickling you because you tickled me. You heard what happened to me when I tickled Catherine and Sarah, and now you’re getting it.”

“BREHEHEHEHEHEHEAK!” Erin begged as her laugher began to falter.

“Well, I suppose she could use a break,” Melissa agreed, seeing Erin’s laughter begin to weaken. Sarah and Catherine relented in their tickling, although Catherine continued to hold Erin’s ankles securely. “But hold her down. I don’t want her getting away.”

“Th-thank you,” Erin said through gasps for air as Sarah sat on her arms to prevent her from escaping. “That… that was torture.”

“Welcome back, Erin!” Melissa redid the greeting. “It’s so nice to have you back.”

“Thanks; it’s nice to be back here,” Erin stated, her breath fully recovered. “So, can Sarah and Catherine please get off me so we can talk more?”

Melissa smiled at Erin and told her,
121331111.title: Not Done Yet

choices: "Come join us in the pool in the back!"
"Let's all go for dinner! I know a great restaurant!"
1213311111.content:
The three Cornwalls backed off, leaving a panting Erin to pull herself together. The four of them all redid their hair, tucked in their shirts, and picked themselves up before all sitting together at the table. The next couple hours were filled with delightful conversation; Erin detailed on about her journalism, Melissa updated Erin on her business and collections, and Sarah and Catherine joined in with stories from school. All four had been working hard lately, and all four agreed they needed a vacation.

Surprisingly enough, the hours ticked by without any more tickling, making Erin relieved. Though, there was a nagging voice in the back of her head warning her that it was being built up for later.

It started to get dark outside, and Erin stood up to excuse herself.

“I should be going now. But thanks for having me! Let’s meet soon!”

“No wait, Erin, don’t go yet!”
1213311111.title: “I guess so.”

choices: Erin tries to ambush the girls despite Melissa's protests
The four girls are ambushed by masked robbers
12133111111.content:
The look of her friend, her friend's daughter and friend's niece was too much, and Erin obliged. Melissa got some frozen o'dourves out and put them in the oven, while everyone went to get changed. Eventually, Erin came down wearing a black bikini, showing off her shapely body, and sensitive stomach. Melissa was next wearing a pink bikini; she had a little more chub to her than Erin, but it didn't do anything to detract from her looks. she looked a little nervous, and Erin guessed that she'd been tickled in the pool before.

Hearing Sarah and Catherine giggling upstairs, Erin got an idea, and hid by the landing wall, beckoning Melissa to join her. Catching on, Melissa quietly slid over; the two young girls had done enough tickling of their own, and it was time to be on the receiving end. When the chatty pair reached the bottom of the stairs, Erin and Melissa jumped out with their hands at the ready... only to see the two girls wrapped up in very thick towels, preventing any sort of ticklish attack.

"Hey! Mom! You planned to get us, didn't you!" said a coy Catherine.

Erin and Melissa were caught red handed, and the devlish looks of the two caused them to slowly step back. They were in bikinis, bellies and other ticklish spots perfectly exposed. The girls were well-protected, and held every advantage.

"Yes d...dear, I know" stammered Melissa, trying to get out of the situation. "But we didn't tickle you! You stopped us!"

"Yeah" said Erin, her voice starting to shake as well. "Can we own our failure, and enjoy the pool now? We won't get outside if we keep trying to tickle each other in here!"

The two girls looked at each other with sly eyes, then back at them. Each held up a single index finger.

"Hands over your heads."

Knowing resisting would make it worse, Erin and Melissa obliged. Catherine approached and stuck her index finger into her mom's deep innie belly button, while Sarah stuck hers into Erin's. Both older women giggled, but the fingers hardly moved. Instead, the girls only very slightly wiggled them, causing only light spits of laughter to escape the mouths of their prisoners.

"All right mom, and Erin, I'll make it clear" said Catherine in a teasing voice. "We are the master ticklers in this household. Understand?"

"Ye...yehehehehssss!!!"

"You understand any attempts to tickle us will only end in your hysterical laughter?"

"Yes! Hehehe please, take it out!! Hahaha!"

The vibrating fingers stopped, and the girls withdrew. Erin and Melissa looked at each other as their breathing returned to normal. They both knew it could have gone a lot worse, and they were very lucky. The four girls made their way out to the back pool, and Melissa entered first, keen to escape the clutches of the terrible ticklers. Erin tried to let the others pass in front of her, but a raised eyebrow from Sarah conveyed a clear meaning, and Erin swam into the pool. The evening water felt nice after a hot day, and Erin swam over to Melissa. she turned around just as Sarah and Catherine removed their towels, revealing respective bright blue and bright green bikinis underneath. Erin's eyes were immediately drawn to their belly buttons; both girls had prominent ball-shaped outies, but both were also pierced; Catherine's navel was decorated by a sizeable gold gem inside a standard piercing, while Sarah had a more dangly one with some very sparkly diamonds hanging down from her belly. Melissa must have noticed Erin staring, and swam in front of Erin.

"Like them? Those are actually rare jewels from Egypt that were shipped to my store! I'm supposed to keep them safe and secret, so I hid them where nobody else could get to them."

Erin smiled; the gems were indeed very pretty. The four enjoyed an evening in the pool and some snacks, before all settled onto a beach chair, far enough apart to prevent any unwanted pokes. The moon was rising now, obscuring much of everything beyond the lights of the water and the house. Erin looked over at the younger girls and saw that their belly button jewelry was still shining enough to be very noticeable.
12133111111.title: "Come join us in the pool in the back!"

choices: A Chuck-e-Cheese style restaurant filled with arcade games
12133111112.content:
Erin couldn't say no to her best friend. Plus, she was starving! She smiled and agreed, and Catherine and Sarah jumped up from the table to head upstairs.

Melissa smiled. "It's their favourite place to eat, and it's only just opened up! You could do some reporting on it! But you will need to change."

"Ooh, something fancy?"

"The exact opposite. The dress code for women there is short shorts, and a belly-top"

Erin was a little taken aback, until she realized.

"It's a tickling-themed restaurant?"

"Yes..."

Erin had mixed feelings; she felt she'd had enough tickling for the day, but she could never get tired of watching Melissa laugh. Plus, there was Catherine and Sarah, and Erin was eager to get revenge on them. She mulled over her decision, before the two younger girls came down dressed for the occasion; both had loose-fitting crop tops on with jean shorts, and Erin had a great view of their ball-shaped outie belly buttons. The sight of them was all she needed to accept.

Erin changed into a black tank top, while Melissa got into a tight-fitting white t-shirt. It came down to below her belly button, but still showed an inch of her tummy above her shorts; Erin figured it might be a loophole, but didn't count on it lasting long.

"Aunty Melissa, can you drive!"

"Sorry Erin. But yes, I'll drive."

Erin was unsure what the apology was fore, until she got to Melissa's car and sat in the back, only for the two younger girls to sit next to her with devlish grins on their faces. Already buckled in, it was too late to change seats; Melissa looked at her all-but-captive friend in the rear-view mirror, and chuckled.

"Don't waste your appetite, girls!"

"We won't, mom! Just a light appetizer!"

The two pinned Erin's arms to her sides, and held their hands above her tummy. Erin braced for tickling, but surprisingly, it never came... at least until the car started, and the vibrations caused their hands to barely scratch her tummy. Erin stifled a giggle, and the car drove off. Sarah and Catherine weren't doing anything outside of holding their hands in front of her, but with every bump in the road, or a sharp turn, their hands grazed over Erin's belly; it was very light tickles all the way to their destination.

Erin thought she would pass out, before Melissa began parking. As the girls started unbuckling, Erin gathered her composure; she looked out the window to see...
12133111112.title: "Let's all go for dinner! I know a grea...

choices: 10 minutes (quality is worth some longer tickles)
30 minutes (the tickling amount is not important, I want that)
121331111121.content:
Looking around at the restaurant, Erin was intrigued and a little scared at the same time. It was an outdoor restaurant, looking like it was straight out of Hawaii itself. All the waitresses were wearing hula skirts, and there were palm trees all around. Of course, there was still the one thing that scared Erin just a little: it appeared that both customers and waitresses were getting tickled all over. The specific reasoning for the tickling was unclear at the time, but Erin was sure that would be made clear very quickly.

“Welcome to Ticklish Tropics, where we always fill your tummy, and tickle it, too” a hostess greeted the four. “Would you like a booth or table?”

“A table!” Catherine excitedly decided, causing Melissa to roll her eyes, but nod in approval.

“Alright, follow me,” the hostess was unfazed by the level of excitement. On the way over to the table, customers reached up from their seats to tickle the new arrivals and their hostess, causing plenty of squealing and squirming. They eventually got to their table after a flood of tickles, and they sat down. “Here are your menus. Have a wonderful time.” The hostess left with a departing tickle to Erin and Melissa, who had been outed as the most ticklish of the group.

After the hostess headed out, Erin looked over the menu and was surprised at what she saw for prices. In addition to a standard price, which looked lower than normal, there was a time like 5 minutes, 1 and a half minutes, or 30 minutes (the highest). She turned to Melissa and asked, “What’s with the times on here?”

“Well, for every meal you get, you get tickled, too,” Melissa explained. “You’ll get tickled once we finish before we leave by the waitresses. By the way, I’m paying for dinner, but only with the money. You have to take the tickling for whatever you buy.”

“Oh, that changes things,” Erin stated, mostly to herself, as the scanned the menu again. After reconsidering her options in light of the new information, Erin decided to order an item with a tickling time of
121331111121.title: Ticklish Tropics

choices: Found Melissa and Catherine at a table alone
121331111122.content:
Erin looked at the place skeptically.

Catherine and Sarah had gone ahead and were waiting by the entrance. Erin waited for Melissa to catch up. Melissa was pulling at her white t-shirt, trying desperately to cover her whole belly.....but to no avail.

Once they met up with Catherine and Sarah, they walked in where they were greeted by a variety of flat screen tvs and a variety of arcade style tickling games and funhouse.

"What is this place?" Erin inquired.

"Giggly Gus's," Sarah replied, "We love bringing our mom here. She's always the life of the party."

Melissa crossed her arms and frowned.

"I hate it here."

Suddenly an alarm was heard behind them. A voice came over the loudspeaker:

"Uh oh we detected a frowny Fred in here. Looks like she needs a visit from Giggles and his Clowns!"

Before Melissa knew what was happening, a clown appeared behind her and pinned her arms behind her, while a trio of his companions came and tickled her torso and underarms. Melissa thrashed in hysterical laughter. As she moved, her tight t-shirt rode up to expose more of her belly.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA STOP IT HSHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAA!"

"Not until you smile!" the clown behind her tased.

"OKOK HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA"

Melissa managed to flash a toothy grin as the six hands tickled her bare tummy. Just before they released her, they lifted up her shirt and drew a smiley face on her tummy.

"So you always know to carry a smile."

Melissa giggled as the felt pen drew a smiley face. It tickled her a great deal.

The clowns departed, leaving the British woman panting and sweating.

"I need to sit and get a drink."

Erin laughed.

"Ok. I'm gonna go use the bathroom and then I'll meet you."

Erin left the three to relieve herself and upon her return...................
121331111122.title: A Chuck-e-Cheese style restaurant filled with a...

122.content:
.........……………….take a ride into town.

By now the hours had dragged into late afternoon and Erin knew that her friend, Melissa Cornwall, would be closing down her business for the day. Melissa was Erin's closest friend on the island and always the first person she wanted to see on arrival.

The Cornwall family had been residents of Cosquillas Island for the past fifteen years by the time Erin took up her summer
residence. The matriarch of the family, Melissa, was in the final year of her thirties, nearly a decade older than Erin, but
remained one of Erin's closest friends.

She was also the most extraordinary woman Erin had ever met.

A mother at age 19, Melissa managed to finish a dual undergraduate degree in the areas of Art History and Art Restoration from
Cambridge University in her native England. Eager to distance herself from the father of her daughter, Melissa had taken a
position at the Cosquillas Island Museum where she worked as a curator. Even with that full time job and supporting her then
infant daughter, Melissa took evening courses online and completed an MBA, while also investing her money in the stock market.

With several successful investments and a business education, Melissa broke from the museum and began her own business
on the island: Cornwall Restoration and Antiques.

Beginning as a shop that restored antique furniture and artwork, the business soon grew into the primary collector of rare
artwork and antiques on Cosquillas Island. With rising profits from the business and continued wise investing, the single
mother soon gathered a sizeable fortune, with which she purchased the sensible cottage that sat across from Erin's and
funded her daughter's education.

Erin first met the intrepid Englishwoman at a local yoga class, where they bonded over their mutual love of art and became
inseparable friends.

Erin thought about all this as her car wound around the windy streets of the island town, before it drew upon driveway the old building that housed Cornwall Restoration and Antiques.

Unlike the rest of the town buildings, the Cornwall Restoration shop sat in an isolated part of town. It was located on a small hill on the outskirts and was accessible by taking the long driveway. The journey was bit of an annoyance, but once you reached the summit of the hill and stood in front of the shop, you could see why the location was used.

The top of the hill offered a gorgeous panoramic view of the town and coastline. So scenic was this view, that Melissa had put several picnic tables and lawn chairs along the hillside, where visitors could sit and enjoy their lunch.

Erin pulled up the long driveway and reached the entrance to the shop, just as it was turning 5:00 p.m. The parking lot was vacant, save for Melissa's car, but the Open sign still hung in the window.

Erin exited the car and made her way to the front entrance. As she pushed the door open she saw......…............
122.title: Head into town

choices: A grin begin to cross Melissa's face
1221.content:
...……………...something that made her immediately close the door and take cover outside.

Luckily the door hadn't been pushed open far enough for the little bell above it to ring. The people inside had no idea she was out there.

"Thanks goodness for that," Erin thought as she began to creep around the building, "Melissa needs my help."

Trotting around the back of the building, Erin found the back entrance slightly ajar. Ever so carefully, she slid through the back door and tiptoed her way to the front of the store. Keeping along the walls, the front desk finally came into view and Erin was able to see and hear with greater clarity the scene that she had nearly walked in on.

In front of the desk was a tall woman dressed in a well pressed business suit and high heels. A domino mask covered her eyes and most of her forehead. Her thick blonde hair was pulled back tight behind her head. In one of her gloved hands was a pistol that was aimed at the frightened British woman in front of her.

Melissa's back was to Erin, but her arms were raised high over her head. It looked like an old stick up scene from a cowboy western. The masked robber began to speak, a thick Eastern European accent coating her words.

"Ms. Cornvall, I don't vish to be here much longer. Tell me vhere the amulet is."

"I-I don't know what you're talking about," Melissa nervously replied, "I don't have anything like that here."

"Nonsense. I've traced it from Turkey to the Ukraine to America and now to this island. This is the only such place on this rock that could possibly have it. I've spent years vorking to acquire it. And I will do vhatever it takes to get it."

Slowly the masked woman began to back away from the desk. She still faced Melissa as she did so and kept her pistol leveled at the young British woman. Once she reached the front door, the masked woman took her free hand and slid the front door lock into place.

Melissa gulped at the sound of the lock hitting home. No escape.

Smiling, the masked woman then slid over to the store sign that still read OPEN and switched it to CLOSED.

"This is so ve vill not be disturbed Ms. Cornvall. Like I said....I am not leaving until I have vhat I vant. And I have vays to get it from you."

She motioned to the wall next to the front desk with her pistol.

"Come out from behind the desk."

Melissa lowered her arms and obediently slid out from behind the desk.

The masked woman raised her pistol again.

"Bring your arms back up."

Melissa's arms went back up again. The British woman was dressed casually for the day, with blue jeans and sandals. She was dressed in a white collared shirt with a pink sweater over it. The pink sweater was a bit small for her though, as it gripped th3 bottom of the white collared shirt when her arms were raised and pulled it up to her ribs, revealing her pale belly.

"Turn around, Ms. Cornvall. Keep your hands raised."

"What are you going to do?"

The masked woman smiled.

"Frisk you darling. Do not make a sound."

Erin could see Melissa's face for the first time when she turned around. The British woman was keeping calm given the circumstances, but Erin could see fear in her eyes.

The masked woman moved behind Melissa and squatted down to begin her search. Erin kept her eyes on Melissa's face, as she saw...…...............……..
1221.title: Robbers holding Melissa up

12211.content:
…………..something stranger. Melissa's scared expression soon changed to amusement. A wide grin began to spread across her lips. As it grew wider, it looked like Melissa was biting down on her lip a little, as if she was trying to keep from laughing.

Erin was surprised. What could she possibly find funny about...……

Uh oh.

The frisking was tickling her.

Erin shifted in her hiding place to get a closer look. The masked woman was squatting down and meticulously tapping Melissa's legs with the tips of her fingers. She slowly moved up from her calf to her thigh on her right leg and down from the thigh on her left leg to her left calf.

Melissa's body began to tense from the touch. She was arguably the most ticklish person Erin knew on the island and Erin couldn't imagine how badly this was affecting her.

The masked woman then rose and moved her hands to Melissa's hips. The British woman's cheeks began to turn red a bit, as she did everything in her power to hold her laughter back.

Then the masked woman's finger moved to Melissa's exposed bare sides.

Melissa's eyes grew wide as the tips of the fingers touched on her bare skin. Erin knew this would be the worst of it. Melissa's torso was her biggest weakness. The ribs, sides, tummy, waist, bellybutton. Tickling any of these areas would drive Melissa absolutely insane with laughter.

The British woman began to sway a little from side to side, as the masked woman dragged her fingers up and down Melissa's bare sides. The robber couldn't see Melissa's expression, but there was no denying the reaction she was getting from touching these sensitive areas.

Finally the robber stopped her search and took a step back. Melissa breathed a sigh of relief, though it was clear that it took a Herculean effort for her not to crack up in hysterical laughter.

"All right Ms. Cornvall. You have nothing on you. I vill give you one final chance to give me the amulet. Or information leading me to it. If you do not...…......I think I know how I vill get it from you."

Melissa closed her eyes and gulped.

"I...I don't know anything."

The masked woman smiled.

"Very vell then. Have it your way."

The masked woman reached into her coat pocket and brought out...…................
12211.title: A grin begin to cross Melissa's face

122112.content:
…………….a bird's feather, which she began to twirl in her fingers.

The masked woman moved closed to Melissa and slowly touched the tip of the feather to the side of Melissa's neck. Melissa snickered and moved her head to the side where the feather touched down.

"Do you feel that Ms. Cornvall?"

"Hehe yees heheheheheheh"

"Do you still vant to keep what I vant from me?"

"I heheheh don't know what you mean."

The masked woman sighed and decided to...………...
122112.title: A feather

1221122.content:
......……..pull the feather away from Melissa's neck.

"Ms. Cornvall. I am losing patience. It vill only get vorse from here."

Melissa took a deep breath and remained defiant.

"I have no idea what you're talking about."

The masked woman signed.

"Then you leave me no choice."

She moved closer to Melissa's ear and began to whisper into it.

"If you vill not tell me what I vant to know, then I will TEEKLE it out of you!"

Melissa shook her head, hoping to still put on a brave front.

"No it won't work."

The masked woman smiled deviously.

"Oh reeeeally?"

"Yes," Melissa retorted, "in fact...I'm not even that ticklish."

The masked woman laughed.

"Ve'll see about that!"

Slowly she moved her feather towards Melissa's bare belly, which remained exposed with Melissa's arms raised. Too afraid of the pistol to lower them, Melissa shut her eyes tight as she felt the delicate tip of the feather begin to move teasingly up and down her stomach. She bit her lip to suppress any laughter, but her growing grin began to allow snickers to escape, betraying how badly the dancing feather was tickling her.

Erin winced as she watched this unfold. She knew her friend wouldn't last long.

The masked woman didn't seem to think so either. She began to use the feather to dust Melissa's ribs and brush her abs. The masked woman could see her bare belly twitch with each touch of the feather and see her body tighten.

"Vere you lying to be about how teeklish you are, Ms. Cornvall?"

"I.....hehehehe….wasn't hehehehehehehehe"

"Are you suuuuuure?"

"Heheheh yes I'm not that ticklisheheheheheheheheh"

"Hmmmm I' not so sure. Let's try something else."

The masked woman put the feather away and used her free hand to wiggle her fingers gently along the exposed belly. Melissa could not longer hold in her laughter. She began to giggle frantically.

"Hhehehehehehhohohohohoo oh no no hahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha!"

"Ah ha! So you ARE ticklish!"

"Hahahahahahahahahahahaha yes yes I lied hahahahahahahahahahahhaah I'm really ticklish!"

The masked woman then began to scratch Melissa's ribs as she continued to tickle torture the poor British girl.

"I thought so. And vhere are you most ticklish?"

"Hahahahahahahhaha my belly my belly ahhahahahahahahahahaahahahahahahahheheheheheheheheheheheheheheh!"

"I see. And after there vhere else?"

"Hhahahahahahahahaha my feet and my toes ahahhahahahahhahahahahahahahhahahahahahahahahahahahahhhahaha!"

The masked woman smiled and stopped tickling. Melissa panted as the tickling stopped. Her arms were still raised above her head, but were now beginning to grow tired.

"All right Ms. Cornvall. You saw how bad this vill get! Tell me about the amulet!"

"I don't know. I really don't. I swear!"

The masked woman sighed.

"Ve need more privacy for this to continue. Where can ve go?"

"I don't...….......HAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHH!"

Before she could finish speaking, the masked woman wiggled one of her ringers around Melissa's exposed bellybutton. Melissa threw her head back and giggled. She hated having her bellybutton tickled.

"HAhahahahahahahahahoh no no hahahahahhahahahahahah!"

"Vhere can ve go?"

"Hahahahahah the store room the store room hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaahhahahahaha!"

The tickling stopped. The masked woman held up her gun and gave the order.

"Lead the vay Ms. Cornvall. I will continue my tickle interrogation there."

"No. Not that. Please. No more."

"You leave me no choice. Lead."

Arms still raised, Melissa began to move slowly towards the back of the store, right in Erin's direction. Erin crouched lower in her hiding spot, desperately hoping to maintain her cover.

As Erin heard the two sets of footsteps approaching, her mind began to race about what she could do. Just as Melissa moved past her hiding spot, Erin decided to...……............
1221122.title: Use the feather somewhere else

choices: Use the desk phone to call the cops
Try and exit the store to signal for help
Sneak into the store room and rescue Melissa
12211222.content:

He sported pressed slacks, polished shoes and a crisp collared shirt. From the looks of it, he was in his late thirties or early forties.

His eyes fell on both women and a friendly smile crossed his face.

"Good evening mes cheres," he said, a thick French accent coloring his speech, "I hope that I am not too late before closing."

Erin looked the man over. There was something familiar about him. She had seen his face before, but could not remember where. It certainly had not been on the island.

Melissa was the first of them to speak.

"No, Francois. Though you have just one second to spare."

The young man moved forward and extended his hand to Melissa.

"I have good timing then."

He took Melissa's hand in his and with a chivalric gesture pressed his lips to it.

"It's good to see you again Melissa."

Melissa smiled pleasantly.

"You as well Francois."

The Frenchman released her hand and turned to Erin.

"Is this a friend of yours, Melissa?"

"Yes. This is my friend Erin, she's a newspaper reporter on the mainland."

Francois extended his hand to Erin and repeated the same chivalric gesture.

"Pleasure to meet you Erin. I am Count Francois Valois. At your service."

The name brought the memory back. Erin now knew where she'd seen him before. Count Valois was a world renowned philanthropist, responsible for the excavation and preservation of numerous historical artifacts. He was also known as an avid adventurer. The papers had dubbed him the modern day Sir Richard Burton.

"Pleasure's mine," Erin replied. "How do you know Melissa?"

The Count started to reply, but Melissa quickly cut him off.

"Count Valois has brought several pieces to me for restoration. He's one of my best customers."

Melissa's cheeks turned red as she spoke. Erin could sense there was more to this than she let on. She'd have to press for more information later.

"Oh...yes," the Count replied, his tone a bit crushed by Melissa's response, "I own a small estate on the island. Melissa has been good enough to help me with its interior design and restoring several pieces that hang there. She does remarkable work."

"Only too happy to help," Melissa said, "Is that why you've come?"

"No cherie. I actually have a small favor to ask of you."

Melissa's eyes narrowed at the young nobleman.

"What kind of favor?"

"Nothing dangerous I can assure you," the Count said smiling, "There is an important package due to arrive on the island from Nepal. It's contents are very valuable and delicate. I am having it sent here and was wondering if you would be kind enough to ensure that the contents are safe."

"Why me?"

"It's a delicate item. It requires delicate hands to care for it."

"What is it?"

The Count paused.

"A rare artifact. The Nepalese call it 'The Golden Fist.' It's been lost for centuries. An old acquaintance of mine discovered it and charged me with its safe keeping."

"What do you plan to do with it?"

"Take it to experts to be verified. Then turn it over for further study. Will you do me this favor, Melissa?"

Melissa took a moment to think it over. It seemed like a harmless enough task. Still............something seemed off, though Melissa could not say why.

In any case, whatever would get the man out of her place of business the fastest.

"All right. I'll look after it."

"Excellent. I knew I could rely on you cherie."

"When is it due to arrive?"

The Count checked his watch.

"8 o'clock this evening."

"8 o'clock? The mail service doesn't run that late."

"Private plane cherie. I have instructed them to take it right here after they land. I know this is an inconvenience, so I am happy to pay you for this service."

Melissa sighed. She had hoped to head home at normal time.

"It's no trouble."

"Thank you. I'd be happy to wait here with you until it arrives to provide company."

"I'll have Erin here with me. Thank you for the offer though."

The Count's shoulders dropped defeated.

"Of course cherie. Um.....all you need do is call once the package has arrived and you've inspected it. I will send my secretary, Ms. Valenka, to retrieve it."

"It will be done then."

"Excellent," the Count replied meekly, "thank you again cherie."

The defeated nobleman turned and made his way to the door. He stopped in the doorway and turned to face them.

"Good to see you as always Melissa. Erin it was a pleasure to meet you."

The door closed behind him with a soft thud. Melissa shook her head.

"Sorry to volunteer you Erin. If I hadn't he'd have stayed and I'd have to sit around here in awkward silence for the next three hours."

"I can't believe you know Count Valois! Why didn't you tell me?"

Melissa shrugged.

"I'm not a big name dropper. Besides, I barely know the man. He's a customer. Nothing more."

Erin eyed Melissa suspiciously.

"Nothing more?"

Melissa shook her head.

"You sure about that?"

Melissa sighed and rubbed her eyes in frustration.

"I don't want to talk about it right now. I'm too exhausted. Are you okay with waiting with me? I can make us dinner at the house afterwards?"

"Sure no problem. Can I help you close up?"

"That'd be great actually. I have some things I need to put in the attic area. Would you mind watching the phone for a second? Once I come back out, I'll show you what you can do to help."

Erin agreed and Melissa disappeared into the back. The store fell silent again, as Erin waited behind the desk. That silence was suddenly broken as Erin heard...................
12223111.title: A handsome man

122231113.content:
………...a crashing sound in the back.

Erin rushed from behind the desk and made her way into the back of the store.

She scanned the various shelves and displays, looking for anything broken on the floor.

But nothing could be seen.

Then a ray of light from her left side caught her eye. It was coming from behind a door to her left labeled "STORAGE."

The door was slightly ajar and she could hear the sounds of struggling.

Erin made her way to the door and entered the storage room. Inside she saw...………….
122231113.title: A crashing sound in the back

1222311131.content:
…………….Melissa's torso and legs hanging from the ceiling.

The storage room had access to a small attic area in the corner of the ceiling through a small door that is wide enough for one person to get through. Even though the ceiling was not that high, a small ladder was required to gain access.

That ladder was now lying flat on the ground along with Melissa's sandals. The source of the crashing sound Erin heard had been the falling ladder.

Erin called up to Melissa.

"Melissa?! What happened?!"

"Erin? Thank God. Get the ladder back up."

"How'd this happen?"

"I went to get back down, but my foot slipped on the top of the ladder and knocked it over."

"Why don't you just let yourself drop? It's not a far fall."

"I can't."

"Why not?"

"Because the sleeves of my shirt are tangled. I need to get my footing so I can untangle them."

Erin smirked and took a look at her friend's predicament. Melissa's feet were at the height of Erin's head. Melissa's torso and legs were all hanging in the storage area, while the top half of her body was stuck in the attic.

To make matters worse of course, Melissa's shirt was pushed up leaving her pale belly fully exposed. Her sandals lay lifelessly on the floor, leaving her feet bare as well.

Erin thought about it for a moment before deciding to...................
1222311131.title: Melissa stuck in the attic

12223111312.content:
‘Well,’ Erin thought to herself, ‘Melissa has got to learn not to let herself get so exposed like this. Earlier, she exposed her entire belly for me to tickle, and now she’s done that again, and added her bare feet in for good measure. I might as well have some fun teaching her this lesson, so I’ll get her with a good tickling. Now the only question is where to tickle. I’ve already gotten her belly, and she’s proven that that’s still a good spot, but should I try to tickle her toes while they’re right in front of my face? Hmm, decisions, decisions.’

“Hey, Erin!” Melissa called down, reminding Erin that her friend was still trapped. “Everything okay down there? Getting that ladder?”

Erin decided that it would be better not to respond, and instead she started tickling Melissa’s……
12223111312.title: Where to Tickle Melissa?

122231113121.content:
...............………..belly.

Erin knew she had to do it. It was too good of an opportunity to pass up.

Only one problem. Her hands couldn't quite reach up to Melissa's stomach.

Luckily for her, she spotted something in the corner of the storage room that provided a perfect solution. Leaning against the corner of the room was an old Egyptian style fan. It was a tall golden pole with a single feather attached to the top.

Perfect for the height.

"Erin!" Melissa called again, "What's going on?"

Erin casually strolled over to the fan and took it in both hands. She then positioned herself to the side of her trapped friend, just far enough that Melissa's flailing legs couldn't reach her.

"Say Melissa...……..before I put the ladder back up, why don't you tell me about the Count?"

"What? Why are you asking about him now? Get me down."

Erin chuckled devilishly.

"Well it's just...…..you're not really in a position to avoid it now. We're all alone with plenty of time. Did something happen between you two?"

"I don't want to talk about it now. I'd like to get down."

"You're not in a position to keep quiet Melissa," Erin taunted, "I could always force it out of you."

"How are you...….oh no. No. NO TICKLING. I've had enough for one day."

"I'll give you one last chanceeeeee."

"Erin I swear to God! If you try and tickle me, I'll kick you!"

"Okay. You asked for it."

"No!"

Melissa began to flail her legs furiously, hoping to connect with something. Unfortunately, she had no idea what was below her, so it was all in vain. After a few fruitless minutes, she let her legs hang exhausted and helplessly below her.

That's when Erin decided to strike.

She slowly raised the feather tipped part of the fan close to the pale white belly that lay helplessly before her. She let it touch gently down on Melissa's lovehandles. Then slowly she let it trace down Melissa's sides, up and down, causing her tummy to twitch.

"What is thahahahahahahahahahahahahahhahahaahhat?! Hahahahahahahhahahah oh no hahahahahahahahahahaha!"

Erin then changed directions, bringing the tip of the feather across the front of her belly and down the opposite side. Then she brought it along Melissa's sensitive waist, causing the trapped British woman to begin kicking her legs again to get the object away from her.

"Hehehehehehaheheheheheeheh oh God stop ahahhahahhhahhhheheheheh that tickles so bad! Hahahahahaahahah!"

Luckily Erin kept the feather one step head of the flailing feet and continued to gently glide the feather all along Melissa's ivory white skin. She danced it gently along Melissa's abs and used it to dust between her ribs.

Melissa kept flailing helplessly as she struggled to avoid getting tickled, but the feather tormenting her belly was sending her into hysterical fits of laughter.

"Hahahahahahahaahahahahaha oh no no hahahahahaah not my ribs! Hohohohohohohohhohohohohohahahahahaaha not there not there hahahahahahahahah!"

"Are you going to tell me?"

"Hahahahahaha no I won't tell hahahahahahaahhaahahahahahahahahahah!"

"All right then. Time to go for the kill!"

Erin then made ready to go for.........................
122231113121.title: Belly

1222311131213.content:
…………………….the bellybutton!

Without warning, Erin plunged the tip of the feather into Melissa's navel. This was by the far the worst scenario for Melissa. Her daughter, Catherine, and niece, Sarah, referred to this as her "Tickle Button." One poke in that area and Melissa would be on the ground in an instant in hysterics. It was so bad in fact, that often times they didn't even need to make contact. Erin could recall one time she had walked in on Catherine and Sarah wrestling with Melissa, when Catherine successfully pinned Melissa's arms above her head. Sarah then straddled Melissa's legs and gently lifted her t-shirt up to her ribs. Sarah teasingly wiggled her finger and Melissa and slowly began to let it drop toward her bellybutton. Before it even touched her stomach, Melissa was writhing with laughter. She was nearly in tears.

That was why when the feather entered her bellybutton, Erin was not surprised by the hysterical reaction.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHHAHHHAHHHHAHHAHHAHAHAA NOT THERE ANYWHERE BUT THERE HAHHAHAHAHHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHHOO!"

"Had enough?"

"HAHAHAHAHAHHAHH YES YES AHHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHHHAHAHHAHAHH!"

"Ready to tell me everything?"

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAH WELL I DONT...….HOHAHAHAHAHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHHE!"

Erin began to twirl the fan and wiggle the feather deeper and deeper into her bellybutton. Melissa's legs stopped flailing, exhausted by their efforts and her laughter.

Erin now had her just where she wanted her.

"C'mon Melissa give up?"

"HAHAHAHAHHHAHAHHAHHEHEHHAHEHEHEHEHEHEH YES YES I GIVE HAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHH!"

"Ready to tell?"
1222311131213.title: Melissa's bellybutton

12223111312131.content:
"HAHAHAHAHA YEEEESSSS I'LL TELL HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH I'LL TELL! HEHEHEHEHEHHEHEHEHE!"

"Well?"

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHH THE COUNT HAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHA WE DATED HAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAH IT WAS MONTHS AGO HAHAHAHAHAHAHHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAH PLEASE STOP TICKLING ME!"

Erin pulled the feather away.

"Wow. No way! You dated him?"

"Yes," Melissa panted, "it was a little while ago. I'll tell you more if you get me down."

Excited to hear the news, Erin put the fan away and stood the ladder back up.

Melissa managed to position her feet on the ladder and slowly descend. Erin stood behind her with arms out, worried that in her weakened state she would collapse.

Sure enough the minute her feet touched the ground, Melissa slumped against Erin. Erin sat down on the floor, with Melissa sitting next to her. Melissa's head was on her shoulder. Erin put her arm around her weary friend's waist and gave her an enthusiastic hug.

"I missed you Melissa!"

Melissa laughed.

"I'm too weak to punch you. But I bet you did."

"So how come things went south with the Count? I can't believe you passed on a relationship with one of the richest men in Europe."

"I don't really want to talk......hehehehehhehehehehe"

Melissa began to gently giggle before she could finish. Erin's strategically placed arm around Melissa's waist had a couple fingers poised on her sides and slid under her sweater. They gently wiggled along her ticklish sides.

"Eheheheheheheh oh oh heheheheeheheheheh no no heheheheheheh!"

"C'mon I want details! You gotta give me more"

"Heheehehehehehehe ok ok I will heheheheheheheheheheeheheheheheheheheehehe"

Erin stopped. Melissa slumped helplessly back against her friend's shoulders.

"God I was hoping I'd get a break from tickling with Catherine and Sarah gone."

"well? Spill!"

"Later. After we leave here we can go back to my house for dinner. I'll tell you then."

"Why not now?"

Melissa sat herself upright against the wall.

"It's a lot to go over and I want to get this place closed down. Once that messenger gets here and the Count's secretary picks up the package I want to be ready to leave. Deal?"

Erin thought about it for a second and decided...……........
12223111312131.title: Yes!

122231113121311.content:
…...……..Erin rolled her eyes.

"Fine. I'll let it go for now. But I wanna hear about it later."

"Done. Now help me up."

Erin stood up and pulled Melissa off the ground. The weary British woman grabbed her sandals and the two girls headed towards the front of the store.

Surprisingly, a large box was already waiting for them at the main desk.

"Did you hear the door open?" Melissa asked.

"Nope. Then again you were laughing pretty hard."

Melissa playfully smacked her friend's shoulder.

"Shut up. All right let's get the rest of the place cleaned up before the Count's secretary arrives."

Obediently, Erin helped sweep and organize the rest of the shop.

About an hour later, the door to the shop opened.

Both girls looked up at the new arrival. It was...……….
122231113121311.title: Deal

choices: Heard a strange sound in the distance
Got into their cars and drove away
1222311131213113.content:
……………..a tall blonde woman dressed in an impeccable business suit and heels.

This was Ingrid Kaufmann, the secretary and faithful assistant to Count Valois. She smiled briefly at the two girls, before beginning her business.

Her tone was colored with a rich German accent.

"Good evening. I am here to pick up a package for the Count."

Melissa patted the top of the box.

"Right here."

"Excellent. Has it been opened?"

"Um. No. I didn't think the Count wanted...."

"You are correct," Ingrid interrupted, "The contents are very fragile and of the utmost importance to his grace. He would prefer that the contents not be disturbed before he has a chance to look at it."

"Of course," Melissa replied, slightly off put by the businesslike tone. "It's yours to take."

"Thank you."

Ingrid strode forward and removed the box from the counter. She moved to the front door and gently pushed it open, calling out in German to someone outside.

A man dressed in a limo driver uniform came quickly to the door and relieved Ingrid of her burden. Once the package was removed, she turned back to the two ladies.

"The Count is grateful for your help. Has he warned you about the contents?"

"Just that the item is of great value." Melissa answered, "Nothing more than that."

Ingrid looked over her shoulder.

"Has anyone else been by to inquire about the package today?"

"No. The only one who talked about it was the Count. He's only been gone an hour."

"Has he told you about...….other interested parties?"

Melissa shook her head.

"I was not aware there were any."

Ingrid sighed.

"I talked to the Count about this several times. He never listens to me."

"About what?" Erin inquired.

"The package," Ingrid began, "is one of the rarest items in the world. It's been the Count's obsession for years. He sank a great deal of money into tracking it down and ensuring its safe arrival here. Until now, his success in locating it has only been made known to myself and the Count. No others."

"Why?" Melissa asked.

"Because there were several other parties who have spent even longer than the Count looking for it. The fewer people who know, the easier it is to conceal its location. When the Count suggested using your shop as a drop off point, I told him to explain to you the danger you would now be in."

Erin and Melissa exchanged nervous glances.

"Danger?" Melissa repeated, "What kind?"

"The people who seek this item are not of the most reputable kind. Several of them are linked to organized crime. But one group in particular has been more...….........troublesome than the rest."

"Who?"

Ingrid's voice now sounded graver than before.

"The Cocegas Crew."

"Who?"

"Three women. From the jungles of the Amazon. They're of immense physical strength and cunning. To them, the item is nearly a God. We've had several encounters with them and they've proven quite formidable. Luckily, the Count was able to outmaneuver them and get the item here. To our knowledge they do not have any idea that the item's here."

Ingrid paused.

"However...…...we must take precautions."

"What kind of precautions?" Melissa asked.

Ingrid reached into her jacker pocket and removed a small cell phone.

"Take this. It's number is not traceable. It connects directly to me. No one else. Should you find yourself or your friend see anything suspicious: being followed by a strange car, anything. Call this number. I will be able to ensure your safety."

"What about the police?" Erin asked.

"They cannot help you. Not against those women. The Count and I know them very well. We are your best defense. Agreed?"

Melissa and Erin looked at each other nervously.

"Agreed." Melissa said finally.

"Good," Ingrid replied, "and DO NOT mention this package to anyone. Is that clear?"

Both ladies nodded.

"I mean it. The more the word spreads the more the Cocegas Crew can find us."

"We both swear." Melissa said.

Ingrid nodded.

"Very well. I will take my leave."

With that, the strange German woman disappeared. Once her car vanished from sight, Erin looked at Melissa with great concern.

"Do you think she's serious?"

Melissa shrugged her shoulders.

"I don't know. But in any case.........it may not be a bad idea for us to keep together tonight. At least until I can talk to the Count more in the morning."

"I suppose so." Erin agreed.

"Good. Let's head back home. Grab a change of clothes. We'll stay a my place tonight."

Grabbing her coat from behind the desk, Melissa led Erin to the front door of the shop.

The two of them then...…..............
1222311131213113.title: The Secretary

12223111312131133.content:
……………...made it to their cars without incident.

As they drove down the narrow driveway and into the night, they failed to see the three figures that stood on the edge of the woods watching. Nor did they manage to see them creep towards the quiet shop and stealthily unlock the front door.

____________________________________________________________________________ _____________________________

Back at home, Erin threw a few items into an overnight bag and slipped out the back door of her house.

She left a few lights on inside to give the appearance someone was home and to ensure that if anyone did break in, she could see them from Melissa's house.

Tiptoeing through her backyard and around the front of Melissa's house, Erin made her way to the front door.

She rang the doorbell, checking over her shoulder to ensure she was not being watched.

Melissa answered the front door.

"Quick get in."

Erin slipped through the front door, which was promptly locked behind her.

"See anyone out there?" Melissa asked.

"No."

"Good. C'mon in. Make yourself at home."

Melissa led Erin to the living room, which was already prepared for her arrival.

Two pizzas were on the coffee table, along with two bottles of wine and glasses. The large leather sofa was arranged with sheets and a small blanket for Erin to sleep on.

Melissa as well was already in relaxation mode for the evening. She was barefoot and dressed in flannel pajama pants and a black, long sleeved crop top sweatshirt, which left her torso from her bellybutton to her bottom ribs exposed.

"You're not going to bed already are you?" Erin asked.

"What? No. I always change into this the minute I get home from work."

Melissa gestured to the food and wine.

"Let's eat. I haven't had anything since noon."

The two girls ate heartily from the pizza boxes and each had a few glasses of wine, which instantly relaxed them both. The secretary's story had shaken them up a bit, so both were eager to forget it.

After they'd eaten and began their catch up conversation, one question was still lingering in Erin's mind from earlier.

"Melissa. Remember what you promised at the shop?"

Melissa sighed.

"Yes."

"Well? Are you gonna tell me about what happened between you and the Count?"

Melissa took a deep breath before answering...................
12223111312131133.title: Got into their cars and drove away

choices: A knock at the front door
122231113121311331.content:
…………"Fine. Hold on first though."

Melissa refilled her wine glass and took a swig from it.

"What do you want to know?"

"How long were you two dating?"

"Um.....probably close to a year."

Erin was stunned.

"A year?! Seriously? I saw you six month ago! How did this not come up?"

Melissa shrugged.

"Must've forgotten."

"Forgotten? C'mon now. We've been friends for years."

"I know, I know. I just......didn't want to make a big deal out of it. He's followed by people everywhere he goes. I was amazed we were able to keep it secret as long as we did. I didn't know how it would turn out, so I figured I'd keep it to myself."

"So.....what happened? He dump you?"

Melissa shook her head.

"I dumped him."

Erin nearly spit out her wine.

"You DUMPED Count Valois? Why would you do that? He's one of the richest men alive!"

"It just wasn't working. He and I had totally different visions of what the relationship was supposed to be."

"What do you mean?"

Melissa sighed and drank more from her wine glass.

"Well, at first things were great. I'd close the shop at five and then we'd go off somewhere. Fly to the mainland. Have dinner at some upscale place in a private room. He lived his life and I lived mine. Our free time was spent with each other. Always something new. Exciting to say the least."

"And then?"

"He......kept talking about our future. Saying he'd take care of Catherine and me. Take us with him on his travels. See the world with him. Tell me I'd never have to work another day in the shop as long as I lived. Told me I could sell it...and this house and come live with him. Never want for anything."

Erin stared at her friend in confusion.

"What's the problem then?"

"When Catherine was born......I had nothing. If my parents didn't live nearby there was a good chance we'd of both been homeless. It took me YEARS......to get on my feet. To get to this island. Get the shop open. Buy this house. Make the fortune I've made.....and get my independence from that past. That shop is a part of me. Just like this house is. They're what I've achieved on my own."

"What's that got to do with the Count?"

"It felt like he was trying to take over. Push me over to the passenger seat of my own life and take it from there. I don't NEED someone to take care of us. I've been able to do that on my own. If I settle down with someone, I want them to be a part of my life, not take control of it. It was a little insulting."

"He didn't mean to be."

"I know he didn't, but a man like that is use to being in control of things like that. I couldn't get him to understand that I didn't want someone taking care of me. I wanted to it to be a partnership. Each of us have our own lives and then combine them. Not me dropping everything in my life to be a part of his. It was a nice gesture but...…..I wouldn't feel like I was living my own life that way. Just living his."

Erin nodded.

"I guess that makes sense."

Melissa took another drink from her glass.

"I felt horrible. I could tell I crushed him. But...….I had to be honest. He seemed to respect that, but it's always tough seeing him now. I feel like he's not use to being pushed away like that. It's like.....he keeps trying to win me back."

"Well it could be worse.........."

Melissa laughed.

"True. Worse things than having a billionaire chasing you...…."

Melissa popped open the next bottle of wine and was about to pour more into her glass when she was interrupted by a noise.

It was...........................
122231113121311331.title: Yes

1222311131213113313.content:
…………………….the shrill sound of a cell phone.

Erin grew wide-eyed.

"Is.....that the phone that German lady gave you?"

Melissa shook her head.

"Nope. My phone."

Melissa put her glass down on the coffee table and walked into the kitchen.

On the kitchen table was the large rectangular phone with the screen glowing. In bold letter on the screen was the word "RESTRICTED."

Curiously, Melissa swiped the screen and put the phone to her ears.

"Hello? This is Melissa."

On the other line she heard...…………….
1222311131213113313.title: Her cell phone ringing

12223111312131133133.content:
…………...a gruff female voice on the other end of the phone.

"Ms. Cornwall?"

"Yes. Who is this?"

"Officer Charlene Flanders ma'am. Cosquillas Island Police."

A shiver went down Melissa's spine.

"Evening officer. Is everything okay?"

A heavy sigh came from the other side.

"'Fraid not ma'am. It looks like there's been a break-in at your store."

Melissa's eyes went wide.

"What?! When?!"

"About thirty minutes ago ma'am. We got a call about an unmarked vehicle nearly hitting a few pedestrians near your shop. They said it came down from the hill. We sent a squad car up there and it looks like one of the windows was broken,"

Melissa eyes narrowed curiously.

"Broken window?"

"Yes ma'am"

"Are you sure? I've got a security system that should've gone off if one of the windows broke."

The officer sighed.

"That's the thing ma'am. No alarm. Someone managed to get around the system. We need you to come down and help us figure out how."

Melissa sighed and shook her head.

"Of course. How much was taken?"

"Not sure ma'am. We need help with that as well."

"Yes officer. I'll be down immediately."

Melissa hung up and quickly strode back through the living room. Brushing past Erin, she went over to a small closet door, where she removed a pair of hiking boots which she put over her bare feet. She removed a coat as well which she through over her crop top sweater and bare belly.

Erin watched her with concern.

"Melissa? What happened?"

"Cops called. Someone broke a window at the shop."

Erin rose immediately.

"Oh my God! You going there now?"

Melissa nodded.

"I'll grab my coat."

Melissa shook her head.

"No."

Erin looked surprised.

"No? Why not?"

"Because...…......something doesn't feel right."

"What do you mean?"

Melissa sighed.

"The cop said the alarm didn't go off. Someone got around the alarm. They don't know how. Remember what the German woman said?"

"About?"

"Reporting anything strange?"

"So?"

"I bought the most up to date system for that store. If a window broke I'd know about it. The security system connects directly to my phone. Nothing was triggered until the cop called."

"So you think...…"

"I don't know. But in case I'm right......I want you to stay here."

Melissa went back into the kitchen and came back with the cell phone Ingrid had given her.

"I want you to take this. If I see anything suspicious when I get to the store, I'll text your cell phone. If I do that, call the Count's secretary on that phone and let her know about the break in. Tell her Officer Charlene Flanders was the one who reported it. Got it?"

Erin nodded. She hugged her friend tightly.

"I hope nothing's missing."

Melissa nodded.

"Me too. I'll be back."

With that Melissa exited. Erin moved to the front window and watched Melissa's car disappear down the driveway and into the dark, clear evening.

Unnerved by the call, Erin frantically grabbed her cell phone and laid it on the coffee table. She then sat on the sofa and held the Count's cell phone tightly in her hands.

After about twenty minutes, Erin's eyes started to grow heavy. She gently laid her head on the arm of the couch and began to gently drift off to sleep.

Just as she was about to fall asleep completely she heard...……........
12223111312131133133.title: A police woman

122231113121311331331.content:
…………..the sharp buzz from her cell phone.

Erin's eyes flew open in panic. She frantically grasped the phone to check the message.

Sure enough it was from Melissa.

Erin gulped and opened the text.

Her eyes glazed over the words that said...…………...
122231113121311331331.title: Her cell phone go off

1222311131213113313312.content:
…………….."Call the Count's phone."

Frightened, Erin flipped open the cell phone from the count and opened the 'Contacts' list.

Only one number. Labeled 'Ingrid.'

Erin pushed call. Before long the thick German voice can be heard on the other side.

"Ms. Cornwall?"

"No. It's her friend Erin. I was with her today at the shop."

"Where is Ms. Cornwall?"

"At her shop. She got a call from the police tonight. They told her someone broke a window at her shop. The alarm never went off. Someone got around the system."

A few seconds of silence passed. Then the German voice began again.

"How long has Ms. Cornwall been gone?"

Erin checked her watch.

"Twenty minutes. She said if she saw anything suspicious when she got to the shop she'd text me to call you. I got that text from her two minutes ago."

"Who told her to go down to the shop?"

"The cop who called her."

"What was the cop's name?"

"She said Charlene Flanders."

"Hold on one second."

Ingrid's voice disappeared for a few minutes. Erin could hear the sounds of papers being rifled through and desk drawers being opened and closed.

A strange shiver began to crawl down Erin's spine. She began to fear for her friend's safety.

Suddenly Ingrid's voice returned.

"Are you there miss?"

"Yes."

"I have checked our records. The Count procured the entire roster of the Cosquillas Island Police Department."

"Okay."

"There is no Charlene Flanders on that list."

Erin's eyes grew wide.

"What? You're sure?"

"Yes. The Count demanded an up to date list from the island government. No such name appears."

"What do we do?"

Ingrid sighed.

"We shall do nothing. I will talk with the Count. We will decide what to do from here."

"What about me?"

"Stay put Miss. I will call you back if we require your assistance."

And with that, the call ended.

Erin fell back onto the couch in complete fright. Her mind racing a million miles an hour.

She decided to...…..............
1222311131213113313312.title: "Call the Count's phone"

choices: A voice around the back of the building
A pair of hands behind her reaching to grab her
12223111312131133133122.content:
…………………….ignore Ingrid's advice. Melissa was her best friend. She would not sit idly by.

Erin grabbed both cell phones and sprinted out the door.

She flung herself into the car and sped down the driveway and into the night.

____________________________________________________________________________ _____________________________

The front of Melissa's shop looked ominous as Erin began her approach.

She had parked her vehicle at the bottom of the hill and crept through the woods to the top to keep out of sight.

As she moved through the woods and drew closer to the building, she could see a few of the lights on the inside of the store on, as well as the light on the front of the building.

She could see Melissa's car parked out front.

No cop car could be seen.

Erin slowly tiptoed through the woods and reached the edge when she stopped short. A soft noise reached her ears that she couldn't quite place.

Slowly turning her head, Erin saw...…………………….
12223111312131133133122.title: Drive to the shop

122231113121311331331221.content:
…………….. a figure against one of the trees a few yards from her.

It was Melissa!

Looking around to make sure no one else was nearby, Erin tiptoed ever so quietly toward her friend.

As she got closer, Erin could see the full extent of her friend's predicament.

Melissa's coat and hiking boots were in a small pile on the ground. The British woman's arms were tied above her head with rope that was wrapped tightly around the tree. The rope wrapped all the way down to her elbows, leaving her arms immobile.

Melissa's legs too were tied to the tree, with rope wrapping around her ankles and knee. Her bare feet stood on a patch of fuzzy moss. Her crop top sweatshirt now left her entire ribcage, sides, tummy and bellybutton completely exposed. Her eyes were blindfolded and a bandanna was wrapped around her mouth.

There were muffled sounds coming from behind the bandanna. This was what Erin had heard.

She slowly pulled the bandanna down and heard Melissa...………...
122231113121311331331221.title: Melissa tied to a tree

1222311131213113313312212.content:
……………..start to giggle.

"Heheheheeh get me out heheheheheheheheheheheeheheheh let me go hahahahahahahahah!"

"Melissa?"

"Heheheheheheheheheh who is that haheheheheheheheehehehehehehehehehe"

"It's Erin."

"Erin! Ohhohohohohohhehehehehehehehehehehehehehe thank God! Hahahahahahahaahahahah!"

"What's wrong with you?"

"Eheheheheheehehehehehehehehehehe it's the...……………."
1222311131213113313312212.title: Laugh

12223111312131133133122123.content:
……………….branches! Ehehehehehahahahahahah they're tickling my belly hahahahahahahahhahahahaaahhahahaha!"

Erin reached into her pocket and pulled out her cell phone. She held the light up on her friend.

Sure enough, on each side of Melissa were two small trees that had branches sticking out. The tips of the branches reached out to the side and were close to Melissa's bare tummy. In the light evening breeze, they were gently swaying and kept brushing against the British woman's ticklish skin. The claw like shape of the branches made it seem like she was being gently tickled by very thin fingers.

"Hehehehehehehehehee it tickles so bad hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahah!"

"Shhhh! Quiet down! Someone'll hear you!"

"Hahahahahahahahahaha I can't I'm too ticklish! Hheheheheeheheheheheheheheehehh!"

"Oh for God sake."

Erin reached down and snapped the branches that were tickling her friend. Melissa's giggling began to calm down and soon she was gently panting.

"Oh. Thank you!"

"I gotta get you out of here Melissa!"

"No wait....Erin don't!"

"Don't what?"

Before Erin could answer, the conversation was interrupted with...…......…..
12223111312131133133122123.title: "The branches! They're tickling my bell...

122231113121311331331222.content:
…………………..a shadow move behind the building.

A sharp voice followed.

"Quick! Get her into the storeroom!"

Erin sprinted out into the open and quickly hid herself along the side of the building. She began to creep along the wall until she reached the back of the building where the loading dock was located.

On the loading dock platform stood a tall muscular woman. She was dressed in yoga pants, white sneakers and a sports bra. A domino mask covered her eyes. The tall woman moved to the side of the loading dock and peered out into the darkness in Erin's direction.

As she leaned closer, a voice came from behind.

"Brooke?! What're you doing?"

Another female voice. Erin could see a second figure appear. Muscular and dressed like the first. Domino mask and all.

"Thought I heard something."

"Get back in. The boss's is about to try and make this Cornwall lady crack. We need you."

Brooke disappeared with her friend into the lighted doorway. Erin peaked around the corner. Door was left open.

She decided to...….........…..
122231113121311331331222.title: A voice around the back of the building

choices: Melissa standing in the middle of the room
Two of the muscular women standing guard
1222311131213113313312221.content:
………………..get a closer look.

Quietly Erin hopped onto the loading dock and went through the lit doorway. Here was where the storerooms were located.

Erin checked down the hallway and saw one of the doors in the corridor was slightly ajar. Checking to make sure the coast was clear, Erin made her way along the walls and looked through the door.

In it she saw...…………….
1222311131213113313312221.title: Investigate

12223111312131133133122212.content:
……………..Melissa standing in the middle of the floor.

The young British woman was blindfolded. Her jacket and hiking boots were thrown on the floor. Her hands were folded in front of her, tied at the wrist with rope. That rope around her wrist then ran above Melissa's head and was thrown over one of the rafters in the ceiling. A muscular woman was holding the other end a few feet away from her.

Melissa feet were bare and rope was wrapped around her ankles and knees.

The muscular woman in front of her began to speak.

"Ms. Cornwall. I do not have all night. Time is of the essence. I need to know if you received a package from a Count Valois this evening."

Melissa remained defiant.

"I don't know who that is."

The muscular woman sighed.

"I don't want to push this any further Ms. Cornwall. But I will do it if I must. I know a package arrived on this island addressed to the Count. Was it delivered here?"

Melissa closed her mouth and turned her head to the side. She would remain silent.

The muscular woman sighed.

"All right then. Brooke. Katrin."

The two muscular women Erin had seen on the loading dock came into view. One stood on either side of the blindfolded British woman.

"Girls. This one plans to be stubborn. Let's fix that."

With a tug, the muscular woman pulled the rope across the rafter, causing the rope holding Melissa's wrists together to rise up. The British woman's arms were raised high above her head and even pulled the short woman nearly a foot off the ground. Melissa's crop top now left her entire rib cage, sides, belly and bellybutton entirely exposed. Her bare feet and toes were now dangling helplessly above the cold floor.

"Now," the muscular woman mused, "let's begin."

Melissa gulped.

"W-what are you going to do?"

The muscular woman grinned devilishly.

"What the Cocegae Crew does best. Cocegas."

"W-what does that mean?"

The masked woman leaned forward and whispered in Melissa's ear.

"Tickle."

Melissa began to shake her head.

"Oh no. No. Not that. Anything but that!"

The masked woman shook her head.

"I warned you Ms. Cornwall. Ladies."

Brooke and Katrin raised their hands and began to wiggle their fingers.

"Here they commmmmmme"

Melissa braced herself as she felt the wiggling fingers touch down on her...…..............
12223111312131133133122212.title: Melissa standing in the middle of the room

choices: Erin tries to create a distraction
122231113121311331331222122.content:
………….soft sides. Melissa gasped and soft giggles began to escape her lips. The two assailants had not plunged their fingers into her skin. Instead they gently, slowly wiggled the tips of their fingers along her exposed skin, teasing the sensitive British woman's stomach. This was only the start. A taste of what they were about to unleash.

It was unbearable to Melissa in any event.

"Ah heheheheheheheheheheh oh no no hahhehehehehehehehe stop stop heheheheheheheheheheheehehhehehehehee!"

The leader of the gang sat on a stool in front on Melissa. She smirked at the sight of the dangling British woman swaying side to side as her two minions torturously wiggled their fingers all over her bare side.

"Now we change things up. Girls."

At a snap of the leader's fingers, Brooke and Katrin changed positions. Brooke moved behind Melissa and placed one hand on each of her sides. Katrin moved to the front and positioned her fingers over the front of Melissa's tummy.

They waited for the order.

"Continue."

Now the wiggling of the fingers resumed. Only this time it was quicker and their fingers dug a little deeper into her sensitive skin. Melissa's swaying turned more frantic as the tickling sensations shot through her nerves. The worst was Katrin, who was switching between the British woman's rib cage and her abdominal area.

The British woman's head was thrown back in hysterical laughter.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHEHHEHEHEHEHEH OH NO HAHAHAHHAHAHAHHEAHAHAHAH STOP IT STOP IT HAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHA!"

"Are you going to answer my question?"

Melissa did her best to get her bearings, before answering...….......
122231113121311331331222122.title: Bare belly

12223113.content:
……………....an elderly woman with a perplexed expression on her face.

Melissa put on a friendly grin and approached the new arrival.

"Hello ma'am. Can I help you with something?"

The frail old woman reached into her pocket and produced a flier, handing it to Melissa.

"I hope so dear. Can you tell me where I can find this address?"

"Of course. Let me see."

Melissa took the flier and examined it. Erin noticed Melissa's expression change to one of confusion as she studied the document.

Finally, Melissa looked back at the old woman.

"You're about a half mile or so from that house. Head back down the driveway and turn right. You'll see it on your left hand side."

The old woman smiled.

"Oh thank you dear. For a minute I'd thought I'd gone too far."

"No problem. Can I ask though...….who is it you all are hunting?"

The old woman checked over her shoulder.

"I'm not really supposed to say dear...….but you have been helpful. As long as you keep this to yourself."

Melissa nodded. The old woman whispered something in her ear before thanking her again and leaving.

Once the door closed, Melissa went back to Erin.

"Wouldn't want to be her right now."

"Who? The old woman?"

Melissa shook her head.

"No. Katrina Gansdor."

"Who?"

"She's the local fitness instructor here. Crossfitter. I've done some of her classes before. Apparently, she's in trouble with the town."

"How do you know?"

"The old woman's flier. It's for a meeting of the town vigilante group. They target people they think need to be punished for incidents that aren't necessarily illegal. Town bullies, that sort of thing."

"Is that Katrina?"

Melissa nodded.

"Oh yes. Katrina's a huge bully. She tall and muscular so it's hard to fight back against her. If you take one of your classes and don't do the exercises precisely...…….she tickles the crap out of you."

"Seriously?"

"Yup. I messed up a pose in her yoga class and she kept me back after class and tickled me for 30 minutes! I don't know what she did.....but whatever it was, she probably deserves what ever punishment they're doling out."

Melissa checked her watch.

"It's closing time, why don't we head back to my place and catch up on things?"

Erin agreed and decided to wait outside.

After about ten minutes, Melissa exited the building and locked the door behind her. As the two women walked to their cars, there was a rustling sound in the bushes.

They both turned to see.........................
12223113.title: A lost old woman

122231131.content:
…………………..the blonde haired head of a woman peeking from behind the shrubs. Her panic stricken blue eyes were wide as she motioned for the two women to come closer.

"Pssssst! Psssssst! Melissa!"

Melissa peered closer at the face behind the bushes, as she took a few steps towards it.

"Katrina?"

"Shhhhhhhhh!" Katrina hissed, "Yes! It's me! Quick come back here!"

"I don't know...……." Melissa hesitated.

Katrina's raised her head a little more into view. Her expression was gravely serious.

"Please." She pleaded earnestly, "I need your help."

Melissa stopped in her tracks. She stared back at Erin, who shrugged her shoulders indifferently.

"Well...…...…...……...…...."
122231131.title: Katrina

1222311311.content:
…………...all right. Only for a second though."

Melissa moved closer to the bushes, before Katrina pointed behind her.

"Your friend too. We've all got to stay out of sight!"

Melissa sighed and motioned for Erin to follow her. In a few seconds all three women were crouching behind the bushes, completely out of view of any passers-by.

"All right, Katrina," Melissa demanded, "What's this all about?"

Katrina stood up for a second, looking around frantically before continuing. While she stood up, Erin took a closer look at the panicked Crossfitter. The muscular blonde woman was close to six feet tall, with well defined arms and legs. Her hair was tied back tight in a ponytail and she wore white running shoes and socks. She also sported white spandex running shorts and a sleeveless cotton t-shirt that read "Gansdor CrossFit." The t-shirt was cut right at her ribs, showing off Katrina's six-pack abs and toned obliques.

It seemed amusing to Erin that such a powerfully build woman was spooked by anything.

"Is that old woman gone?" Katrina asked, as she crouched back down.

"Yes." Melissa answered, "Why?"

Katrina let out a relieved sigh.

"I thought I'd never get rid of her. She's got the whole town looking for me."

"Again," Melissa repeated, "why? Why are they looking for you?"

Katrina hesitated before she continued.

".....I tickled the mayor's wife."

"What?"

"You heard me," Katrina sheepishly replied, "She took one of my yoga classes. I didn't think she gave enough effort, so I asked her to stay after class and tickled her as punishment. I didn't know that's who her husband was. Next thing I knew, I started getting anonymous letters from the town vigilante group, saying I needed to appear before them for punishment by today. I panicked and went into hiding. That's when that old woman started moving around town asking people about me. I thought when I hid up here, she'd never find me."

"Why'd you come here?" Melissa asked.

"Your shop's out of view. People can't see me up here......at least for now. That's why I need your help."

Melissa glanced over at Erin.

"What kind of help?"

"Hide me at your house. You've got a isolated place on the hill. Just 'til this blows over."

Melissa shook her head.

"No way! Why should I help you?"

Katrina looked shocked.

"What do you mean?"
