"I mean you tickle the crap out of me all the time in your classes! You deserve whatever you get!"

Katrina fell to her knees in front of Melissa.

"Please. Please. I'm begging you. I'm sorry. I really am. I won't do it anymore. I just need a place to lie low. Just until I can get a way off the island."

Melissa looked over at Erin again. Katrina's face was filled with absolute terror. Whatever the group had planned for her was enough to have resorting to begging. Perhaps that mental anguish was enough punishment for the time being.

Melissa took a moment to think it over before giving her reply.
1222311311.title: All Right

12223113111.content:
"I can't believe I'm agreeing to this."

Before she knew what happened, Katrina reached over and lifted Melissa into an enormous bear hug. Melissa's eyes nearly bugged out of her sockets from the forcefulness of the hug.

"Thank you!" Katrina said gratefully.

"Yes," Melissa gasped, "no problem...….just......let me go before you snap my spine!"

"Oh. Sorry."

Katrina released Melissa, who fell to her knees gasping for breath. When she recovered, Melissa peeked over the bushes.

"Erin," Melissa said, "you take off in your car first. Keep an eye out for anything on the road. If you see any check points or members of the vigilante group, text me. I'll wait until you're back home and you give the okay before I take Katrina there."

Erin nodded.

"Done."

Cautiously, Erin hopped out from behind the bush and went to her car.

Peeling down the hill and through the windy roads, Erin did not see any signs of life, which came as a great relief to her.

Reaching the her driveway without incident, Erin immediately texted Melissa once she shut her engine off, letting her know that the coast was clear.

Melissa instantly texted back.

"Great! It will take us exactly ten minutes to get home. If it takes longer than that...….something is wrong."

Heading into her house, Erin watched from her front window with great anticipation.

As the ten minute mark approached, Erin saw something out of the window.

It was............…...
12223113111.title: Yes

122231131112.content:
……………..the headlights of Melissa's car.

Ten minutes on the dot. Erin heaved a sigh of relief.

She exited her front door, just as Melissa was pulling up in her own driveway and shutting off the car engine.

Melissa hopped out of her door and greeted Erin.

"Thank God. You were right. No one on the road."

Erin looked at the Melissa's car.

"Where's Katrina?"

Melissa grabbed Erin by the elbow and took her a few steps away from the car. She lowered her voice as she spoke.

"She's lying down in the trunk. I told her not to move until I opened the trunk."

Erin looked at Melissa suspiciously.

"What is it?"

Melissa hesitated.

"We're taking a big risk doing this. We get caught and we get punished with her."

"What were they going to do to her?"

"No idea. She won't tell me. In any case......I don't trust her completely. That's why I need your help with something."

"Sure anything."

Melissa check over her shoulder and slipped a key into Erin's hand.

"This'll get you into my back porch. There's plenty of space for you to stretch out back there. We won't be able to see you, but you'll be able to see and hear everything that goes on inside the house. Until I can figure out exactly what is going to happen and what Katrina's game is, I want you to stay back there tonight. That way if anything happens, you'll be able to help."

Erin nodded.

"Done."

"Good. Quick...…..get around back. Once you're out of sight, I'll let Katrina out."

Erin grasped the key firmly in her hand and sprinted towards the back of the house.

Melissa's back porch was completely enclosed, with large glass windows surrounding it and an enormous sun roof that let plenty of light in. There were dozens of tall plants lining the windows, making it difficult to see the entire porch from the outside.

Erin slipped the key into the door lock and let herself in.

She ducked behind one of the sofa's in the room and lay there silent for a few moments.

From a little distance away, she could hear Melissa and Katrina entering the house. A few moments later the light in the porch came on and Erin looked over the sofa.

It was Melissa.

She had a blanket and pillow in her hand, which she promptly gave to Erin.

"Katrina went to use the bathroom. Just keep an eye out for anything suspicious tonight."

Erin agreed and Melissa left her in darkness once again.

After a few moments, Erin moved from behind the couch and set herself up on it to sleep for the night.

She could not tell how long it was after she dozed off, but she was suddenly awakened by a noise.

It was coming from...…...........
122231131112.title: Melissa's car

1222311311122.content:
……………...Melissa's living room.

Quickly and quietly, Erin crept through the dark porch and slid the door leading to her kitchen open.

As she did, she could hear the sound of rapid footsteps and hysterical giggling.

Erin pinned her back against the kitchen wall and slid closer and closer to the doorway that led into Melissa's living room.

Peering around the corner, Erin could see...……………….
1222311311122.title: Inside the house

choices: Katrina trapped Melissa's feet & was tickling them
Katrina was stuck in an embarrasing situation
12223113111223.content:
…………………….something that caused her to silently snicker.

Making sure to keep out of sight, Erin watched as...……………..
12223113111223.title: Something else

122231131112231.content:
.................Melissa hung helplessly upside down, her cheeks rosy from her hysterical laughter.

Katrina had one arm wrapped around the British woman's ankles. Melissa, hoping to steady herself, had her hands planted on the ground. It looked at first like Katrina was holding her up to do a handstand, but as Erin drew closer she could see that was not the case.

Katrina's free hand had removed Melissa's shoes and socks and was tormenting her bare feet and toes. Melissa was laughing helplessly, unable to pull herself up.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHAH!"

"I told you I'd get you," Katrina taunted, picking up her tickling pace, "am I forgiven yet?"

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA NO NO HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAH!"

"Okay. Have it your way."

Katrina then decided to...............
122231131112231.title: Katrina trapped Melissa's feet & was tickli...

122231131112232.content:
……………..Katrina standing in the middle of the room struggling. Melissa was doing her best to help, but could not help laughing at the predicament herself.

"Haha well," Melissa laughed, "apparently my sweatshirts will not fit you after all!"

Katrina turned from side to side. A black sweatshirt covered her head and ran down her arms all the way to the bottom of her triceps. Unfortunately, because the sweatshirt was a snug fit, it could not be moved down any further down. The six foot muscular woman was standing with her arms over her head, stuck and tangled in the fabric of the sweatshirt, while her head was completely covered. Katrina struggled for a few more seconds, before finally giving up.

Standing there with her arms out and head trapped in a small sweatshirt, the young crossfitter looked like a very muscular scarecrow.

Katrina let an embarrassed giggle escape.

"Yeah...….sorry about that."

"It's all right," Melissa replied, stifling another laugh.

"Mind helping me out of this thing?"

"Sure. Hold on. Just.....stand still."

Melissa took a step forward and...….......................
122231131112232.title: Katrina was stuck in an embarrasing situation

1222311311122321.content:
…………………….stopped.

A devilish grin crossed her face.

The British woman had taken full stock of Katrina's predicament. Katrina was still wearing her cotton cropped gym t-shirt. With the sweatshirt trapping her arms up and only reaching to the bottom of her triceps, the young crossfitters armpits were completely vulnerable. To make matters worse, the cropped t-shirt had risen a bit higher, leaving the muscular woman's ribs, obliques, sides, middle and lower back, six pack abs, tummy and bellybutton completely bare.

Then Melissa remembered all the times Katrina had tickled her in their training sessions.

Perhaps now was the time for payback.

Gently, Melissa crept forward to the trapped woman and decided to...……………..
1222311311122321.title: Stopped

choices: Katrina fell onto the sofa, allowing Melissa to take full advantage
Katrina managed to break free of the sweater
12223113111223211.content:
Slowly and deliberatively, Melissa extended a lone finger and lightly caressed Katrina’s toned stomach.

The young Crossfitter twitched sharply at the touch, having been caught off guard, and a giggly protest immediately erupted from the confines of the tight sweater.

“Hehehehey what was thahat fohohor?”

Melissa herself initially recoiled from the contact but then a knowing and uncharacteristically mischievous grin suddenly overtook her. Inching her way forward again, she repeated the motion but this time used two fingers, her index and middle finger, to gently prod at the exposed tummy.

Again Katrina flinched and took a step back while letting out another flurry of muffled giggles.

“Hehehehe cut thahahahahat out hehehe!”

Her grin not abating, Melissa carefully took a step closer to Katrina and reached out with both hands to goose her sides. Katrina took a second step backwards and nudged the coffee table in her sweater-induced blindness.

“Hmm, why should I do that” she enquired in a tone of mock curiosity.

“Whahahahahy ahahahare you dohohoing thihihis hahahahaha”

“Well Katrina” Melissa began thoughtfully while continuing to advance on the retreating woman. “It seems to me I’m going out on quite a limb for you, given how you’ve tickled me and just about every other woman on this island in the past”

As Melissa spoke her hands flitted from one inch of exposed skin to another, compelling Katrina to continue stepping back defensively and maintaining a constant stream of giggles.

“Hehehe plehehehease Mehehehelissa this isn’t fahahahairahahaha!”

Ignoring the torrent of pleas, Melissa continued.

“You know I’d be in deep water if the townsfolk ever found out I was sheltering you here. All that risk and for what? For a teacher who tickle tortures her students for even the smallest mistakes!”

Despite her reprimand, Melissa’s tone remained playful as she kept backing Katrina up, causing the trapped trainer to back into a cupboard and hastily realign her direction in response.

“And although I’d never normally take advantage of someone in such a vulnerable position, I can’t help but feel I’d never forgive myself for passing up such an unlikely and ironic opportunity!”

With that, Melissa dispensed with the light poking to rush forward and skitter both sets of fingers along both sides of Katrina’s belly.

“AHAHAHAHASTAHAHAHAHAHAP” Katrina yelped as she practically leapt back, almost losing her balance in the process. “JUHUHUST WAHAHAIT HAHAHAHAHA I’LL HEHEHEHE GEHEHEHEHET YOU FOR THIHIHIHIHIS HAHAHAHAHAHA”

Still watching from the doorway, Erin had to stifle her own laughter at the sight of the tough Crossfitter forced to trip and stumble blindly while the considerably smaller British woman kept up her onslaught, backing her around the room effortlessly.

At that moment…
12223113111223211.title: Poke her belly

choices: Tickle Melissa and Erin to convince them to help her
Do nothing. A noise stops her
Erin tries to get her to change her mind
12223113112.content:
After a few moments of silence, Melissa looked Katrina firmly in the eyes.

"No."

Katrina's face fell.

"What?"

"You heard me. No. I'm not helping you."

The young crossfitter's eyes grew wide with fear.

"You can't be serious. I need help. That vigilante group is gonna be everywhere looking for me!"

"I don't care," Melissa retorted, "I'm not risking my neck for this. I already told that woman I haven't seen you. If I get caught, I'll be punished as well. And besides...……….you deserve what you're gonna get. I'm sick of you tickling me. So are the other people in your class. You brought this on yourself."

Katrina stood in front of the young British woman in stunned silence. Her anxiety about her current predicament was now beginning to grow.

That was when the muscular CrossFit woman decided to...……...…..
12223113112.title: No

choices: Katrina being kidnapped by several mysterious figures in cloaks
122231131122.content:
…………………….freeze in fear.

Across the property there came a snapping sound. It sounded as if something was coming out of the woods.

Katrina looked at Melissa with a frightened expression.

"Can you at least tell me the best way off the hill?"

Melissa sighed.

"Down that way," Melissa relented, pointing to a pathway in the woods behind them, "that'll keep you a good distance from the road."

Katrina nodded and bolted in the woods.

Erin and Melissa turned in the direction of the noise...…………….only to see a fawn come into the clearing.

Nothing to be alarmed about.

Erin shook her head at Melissa.

"You're really gonna leave her to her fate?"

Melissa nodded.

"Absolutely. I'm not getting involved. She's strong. She's in good shape. She'll be fine."

With that, Melissa removed her keys and made sure that the door to her shop was locked. Walking back to her car, she gave Erin a friendly smile.

"Well then...….shall we go off to...………...."

Suddenly, a noise came from the woods where Katrina disappeared. Melissa and Erin exchanged a nervous glance.

Their curiosity peaked, the two women slowly tiptoed into the woods and followed the path that Melissa pointed out. Keeping low along the tree line, they soon saw a clearing where Katrina came into view.

With a shocked look, the women saw...…............
122231131122.title: Do nothing. A noise stops her

1222311311221.content:
………......Katrina swinging upside down. A rope was dangling from a high tree branch with the other end wrapped tightly around her ankles. It was a classic animal trap that was now held the CrossFitter captive and left her arms and head hovering roughly a foot above the ground.

Erin elbowed Melissa.

"We should help her," Erin whispered.

Melissa nodded, but before they rose to their feet to help...…………………..five mysterious figures entered the clearing. They appeared to be human, though admittedly it was tough to tell. The thick cloaks they wore covered their entire bodies, with thick hoods that covered their heads and obscured their faces.

Melissa's eyes grew wide.

"The vigilante group."

Katrina seemed to realized it as well. Hoping to make use of her strong abs, she attempted to bring her arms up to her ankles and undo the ropes. As she did this, one of the cloaked figures snapped their fingers and immediately two of the others moved forward, one on each side of the trapped girl.

The figure who snapped their fingers spoke. The voice was low and gravely.

"Tie up her arms."

At that order, each of the two cloaked figures who stood on either side wrapped themselves around each of Katrina's muscular arms and began to struggle with her to bring them down. Katrina was stunned by their persistence and was immediately brought back to her original dangling position. However, being strong and resilient, Katrina tried to curl and thrash her arms, in spite of hanging upside down, and began to enter into a tug of war with both her assailants.

"Stop! Let me go!" she cried, "Somebody help!"

With Katrina and the two thugs at an impasse, the figure snapped their fingers again.

This time another one of the cloaked figures stepped forward to join the fray. The figure approached Katrina and..................
1222311311221.title: Katrina hanging upside down

12223113112213.content:
…………………..moved behind her back.

While the two minions had a hold of each arm, Katrina's torso was entirely unprotected. To make matter worse, her sleeveless crop top slid down in her upside down state to her sports bra, leaving her ribs, sides, belly and mid to lower back entirely exposed. Two bony hands emerged from the cloak's sleeves and they immediately dug into the muscular woman's torso.

Katrina's eyes bugged out of her sockets and she immediately began to burst into hysterical laughter.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHHAHAHAHAH!"

The figure tickled her harder and moved its fingers around her torso with expert precision.

Another snap of the fingers were heard. The last remaining figure moved forward and...………....
12223113112213.title: Starting tickling her bare belly

122231131122133.content:
…………….began tickling the backs of her thighs. Katrina flopped in ticklish agony as both her stomach and legs were being mercilessly tickled.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHA NO NO HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAH!"

Feeling her strength beginning to drain from her arms, the two minions holding her arms reached down and began to tickle her armpits, kicking her laughter up further.

Slowly the thrashing began to subside, as Katrina began to grow weak with helpless laughter. The young Crossfitter soon found herself hanging helplessly upside down, giggling hysterically and physically unable to fight back against her captors.

"HEHEHEHEHEHEHEHHSHSHEHHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEEHEHEHEHS TOP HEHEHEHEHEH!"

Satisfied that she had been subdued, the two minions at her arms stopped tickling her armpits and moved her arms behind her back. The minion tickling her thighs saw this and stopped as well, disappearing into the woods and returning with large lengths of rope. Only the minion tickling her stomach continued, digging into the woman's obliques and across her tummy and keeping her helplessly giggling.

The minion with the ropes tied Katrina's wrists tightly behind her back as she dangled upside down and wrapped rope around her forearms all the way up to her elbows. Additional rope was then wound around her shoulders, pinning her arms tightly behind her.

The minion then motioned for the two holding her arms to lift Katrina up. Obediently, the moved their hands from her arms and lifted her from behind her shoulders, hoisting her upperbody up so that she was almost parallel to the ground. The minion tickling her stomach adjuster its position and continued its furious tickling assault, causing the muscular woman to go into silent laughter.

Rope was then tightly wound around her ankles all the way up to just below her knees, pinning her legs tightly together. It was only then that Katrina was cut down from the tree and laid onto the ground.

Finally, the tickling stopped and the young woman lay completely tied together and panting heavily. A blindfold was placed around her eyes and Katrina was allowed a few moments to rest.

The cloaked leader then issued order to......….........
122231131122133.title: Tickled her thighs

1222311311222.content:
………………..a horrific sight.

A trio of mysterious figures draped in black cloaks with heavy hoods that obscured their faces had captured the young CrossFit woman.

Katrina was blindfolded and deprived of her running shoes and socks. She was tied to a thick oak tree. Her arms were stretched high above her head, leaving her bare underarms vulnerable and causing her sleeveless crop top to rise just below her sports bra and leaving her muscular torso exposed.

The young Crossfitter's feet were a good foot off the ground, giving easy access to her bare feet. Ropes were wound round the tress and tightly over her ankles, shins, wrists and forearms.

Katrina was trapped and at the mercy of these tree mysterious figures.

One of them now stepped forward and spoke.

"Katrina. You will now face punishment for your crime."

Katrina gulped.

"What are you going to do to me?"

The figure did not reply. Instead, the figure glided slowly and noiselessly forward, close to the tied up CrossFit woman. Leaning close to Katrina, the figure whispered something in her ear.

As the figure moved back, Katrina began to shake her head in panic.

"No. No. Not that. Please not that. I won't be able to stand it!"

The figure snapped its fingers as it began to take a few steps back. At the sound, the other two cloaked minions reached into the folds of their robes and removed to large feathers.

Slowly and silently they moved towards the trapped muscular woman and began to..................
1222311311222.title: Katrina tied to a tree

1222312.content:
…………………..the shrill ring of Melissa's cell phone on the front desk.

"Hold on a second, Erin. I've gotta get that."

Melissa made her way over to the desk and plucked the phone off the surface.

"Hello?"

Erin began to pace aimlessly around the room, admiring the various oddities and knick-knacks lining the walls of the shop. She didn't want to stare at Melissa's private conversation, though she did allow herself to pick up bits and pieces of it from a distance.

"When did you land? Five minutes ago?! Wow you made great time! Yeah, I'll head over to pick you up in fifteen minutes or so. It'll take me twenty to get over to the airport. Ok see you soon! Can't wait!"

Erin heard the faint click of the phone being returned to the table.

She turned towards Melissa.

"Who was that?"

"It was...……...….."
1222312.title: Melissa's cell phone ringing

choices: Was ambushed in the driveway by an unknown person
Went for a walk in the woods
12223123.content:
"...………….an old friend of mine from Cambridge. Marie Blanc. She's coming to keep me company while the girls are away."

"That's great."

Melissa smiled.

"I haven't seen her in a long time. She went back to Marseilles after we finished school. I'd visit her every so often, but once I came out here, it's mostly been emails and texts. It'll be good to see her."

Melissa stopped and checked her watch.

"Speaking of which, I've got to shut down things here. I'm so happy you're hear as well! You should come by the house and meet Marie."

"Sure that'd be great!"

"Excellent. Let's see...…..it's about six now. Why don't you come by around 8? That'll give Marie time to settle in."

"Perfect!"

Erin left the store and headed back through town towards her house.

She pulled into the driveway and......…………..
12223123.title: A friend of mine

choices: Try and open the front door
Head around to the back porch
122231231.content:
…………...walked into her living room.

Laying down on the couch, Erin allowed herself a few moments to relax. She made herself a quick supper, took a long shower and changed clothes.

Before long, it was close to eight o'clock and she prepared to head over to Melissa's place.

Walking across the way towards the British woman's home, she could hear some commotion coming from inside.

Erin trotted over to front door and knocked.

A few minutes passed...….and no one came to answer. However, Erin could still hear noises coming from inside.

She knocked again. Harder this time.

Still nothing.

Erin decided to...……………..
122231231.title: Went inside the house

choices: Melissa tied up on the couch being tickled on her underarms
Melissa having her feet tickled on the floor
Melissa trapped upside down being tickled on her belly
1222312311.content:
……………….reach out and try the front door.

Luckily for her it was left unlocked.

Making sure not to disturb anyone inside, Erin gently pushed the door open and slid into the house.

Her ears were greeted with the sound of hysterical laughter.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAAHAHA OH NO HAHAHAHAHH NOT THAT ANYTHING BUT THAT HAHAHAHAHAHHA!"

She instantly recognized the laughter as belonging to Melissa.

The calm voice, colored with a French accent, that cut in between the hysterical laughing was coming from her friend, Marie.

"Ha ha! I have got you now cherie! You could not run from me for long could you?"

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA STOP HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH NOT THAT AHAHAHAHA!"

"Ah ah this is what you get for lying! Now you will pay the price."

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHE !"

Erin gulped. She could only guess what was happening.

Slowly, she inched along the wall until she reached the doorway to the room where the laughter was emanating from. Inside the room she saw...................
1222312311.title: Try and open the front door

12223123112.content:
……………...Melissa on her back on the floor. The young British woman was dressed in a pair of dark flannel pajamas, her arms flailing in every direction and her upperbody twisting and turning in hysterics.

Calmly seated on Melissa's shins, was Marie, a well dressed and dark haired Parisian woman. The French woman had an amused look on her face as she friend was in absolute hysterics. She sat with her chin on one hand, while her other well manicured free hand was gently and delicately tickling and teasing the pale bare feet of Melissa that stuck out from the bottom of her pajama pants.

"My my cherie," Marie bemused, "you're even more ticklish than I remember."

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHA YES YES HAHAHAHAHAHHA!"

"Then you should've known better than to lie to me. Oh well, I will get you to admit the truth."

Without missing a beat, Marie's free hand gently traced its nails up and down Melissa's bare arches. She made sure to make just enough contact with the skin for Melissa to feel them, but light enough that they sent severe tingling sensations throughout her skin. As the French woman's weight was solidly on her shins and ankles, all Melissa could do was move her feet from side to side, but it was a futile gesture. Marie's fingers torturously tickled her sensitive soles, leaving the British woman weak with laughter.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH I GIVE UP HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH!"

"I thought you would," Marie mused, slowly moving her fingers up the soles and towards her toes, "however, I will need to get a truthful answer to my question."

The French woman's fingers now reached the base of Melissa's toes. The nails snuck their way into the sensitive spots beneath them and dug in. Melissa's laughter kicked up another octave, as her arms and upperbody flailed even harder on the floor.

"Once again: did you miss me, cherie?"

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA YES YES HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"

"You did!" Marie laughed, "So you lied before?"

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA YES YES I LIED HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"

"That's insulting!" teased Marie, "Will you make it up to me?"

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHH YES YES HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA ANYTHING!"

"Anything?" Marie's eyes lit up, "Really? ANYTHING I want?"

"HAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEH YES ANYTHING HAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAH!"

"Hmmmmm okay cherie," Marie said, digging furiously into her toes, "We will do a tickle game then. Okay?"

"HAHAHAHAHAHAH YES YES OK OK HAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHA I'LL DO IT HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAAHAHAHAHHAHAHHAAHAHA!"

"Wonderful!"

With that the tickling stopped altogether. Melissa lay in a panting heap on the floor, Marie still seated firmly on her shins and ankles.

"I missed you too, cherie."

"I bet you did," Melissa panted.

Marie reached into her pocket and pulled out a large coin.

"Remember this coin cherie?"

Melissa sat up on her elbows. Her eyes went wide at the sight of the coin.

"Oh no. No. Not this game."

Marie smiled deviously.

"Oh yes. Remember," she said gently tracing Melissa's feet and toes again, "ANYTHING I want."

Melissa began to snicker and giggle at the tickly touches. She knew what would happen if she refused.

"Hehehehehe ok ok hehehehehehehehehehehhehehehe I remember. Anything heheheheheheheh"

Marie stopped.

"Good. Now as you remember, I will flip this. Heads is your lower body. Tails your upperbody."

Marie flicked the coin high into the air. Melissa propped herself up on her elbows to see the verdict.

The coin it the ground with a soft thud. Both ladies leaned over to look.

It read....................
12223123112.title: Melissa having her feet tickled on the floor

122231231122.content:
……………….tails.

Marie gleefully clapped her hands at the result. Melissa gulped and fell back to the ground.

"Upperbody it is cherie," Marie declared. "Now, we will need to decide how to proceed. First thing, as you remember, you will get to choose where you get tickled. Will it be your belly or your armpits?"

"I don't know......hehehehehehehehehehehehehehehhehehehehehe"

Melissa's answer was cut off. Marie began to scratch her toes again, making sure there was no further delay.

"C'mon now choose."

"I eheheheheheheheheheh don't know ehehehehehehehehehehehhehehe."

"Choooooooose," Marie teased, "or I tickle your toes harder."

"Hehehehehehehehehehehehehe okay," Melissa blurted...………..
122231231122.title: Tails

choices: Tried to make a break for it
1222312311222.content:
………....My belly! hhehehehehehehehheheheheheheheheh Belly!"

The tickling stopped. Marie clapped her hands again. Melissa instantly regretted her choice.

"Oh no!"

"Oh yes!" clapped Marie, "Excellent. Now to make sure you are adequately prepared. Raise your arms over your head."

Melissa started to protest, but saw Marie wiggle her fingers furiously down towards her feet and swallowed her protest. Laying back on the ground, Melissa raised both arms straight above her head. Her flannel pajama top rose about a centimeter above her bellybutton, leaving a good amount of her pale belly exposed.

This seemed to please Marie.

"Wonderful!" she exclaimed.

Melissa started to put her arms back down, but Marie stopped her.

"Wait!" Marie cried, "Put them back up."

Melissa obeyed instantly. Marie shifted her position on Melissa's legs, so that she was now straddling her thighs and facing the British woman's bare belly. She moved both hands menacingly over the pale skin of Melissa's exposed tummy, keeping her fingers an inch above the skin. Melissa kept her arms obediently upwards. She was too scared to move.

"Now then, cherie," Marie began, "I am going to get off your legs. You are to scoot back to the staircase and bring your back against the wall. If you try to escape..........."

Marie's fingers began to wiggle. Slowly and torturously, though they did not move from their place one inch above Melissa's tummy. Melissa shifted uncomfortably and shut her eyes. A smile cracked across her lips, along with a few giggles. She even began to shift her hips slightly, as if the tickling was already happening.

Marie smiled.

"...............if you try to escape. I will tickle you without mercy. Understand?"

Melissa nodded.

"Good."

Marie hopped off Melissa legs and onto the floor.

"You may lower your arms and scoot to the wall."

Melissa instantly brought her arms down and propped herself up onto her bottom. She then.....................
1222312311222.title: "Belly!"

12223123112222.content:
…………..didn't take any chances. Slowly she scooted across the floor on her bottom until her upper back was against the wall lining the staircase.

Marie moved over to her and sat beside.

"Good. Now stick your legs out straight. Your lower back can move away from the wall. Keep your upper back and shoulders against it."

Melissa obeyed.

"Good. Now raise your arms up."

Melissa did as she was told. Marie removed the scarf that was around her neck and tied it around Melissa's wrists and around the railing of the stairs. This stretched Melissa's arms straight above her head, though her bottom still remained on the ground. The flannel pajama top had risen again just above the bellybutton, as Marie straddled Melissa's shins once again. She stared intently at the section of pale belly that now stared back at her.

"Hmmmmmm," Marie mused, "needs some help."

She slowly reached over and began to roll the bottom of Melissa's pajama top up to the top of her ribs, where she promptly tied it in a knot. Then, she grabbed Melissa's legs and gently brought them a little further away from the wall. The British woman now formed an obtuse angle across the floor, with her entire chubby torso exposed to tickling fingers.

Melissa gulped. Marie smiled.

"Now...……..where to begin?"
12223123112222.title: Scooted to the wall

choices: Crouch out of sight and watch
Call to Melissa through the glass
1222312312.content:
………………...head around back.

The noises from inside sounded like they were coming from the back of the house. That would explain why no one could hear her knocking.

Erin moved away from the front door and trotted around the side of the house.

She soon reached the back porch. This was Erin's favorite part of Melissa's house.

The wooden deck had been completely renovated by the young British woman. A roof had been added over it and rather than screens encasing the side, it was surrounded by large glass windows. With a window in the center of the roof, the entire porch acted as a greenhouse and was filled around the perimeter with a variety of flowers and herbs that Melissa and her daughter grew themselves.

Erin moved to the porch entrance and tried to open the door.

Locked.

The lights on the back porch were turned on full blast, so Erin could see inside the whole porch. In the center of the room, was a sofa flanked on each side by an armchair. They were arranged in a semicircle with side tables on the ends. This was where Melissa would have guests after dinner to relax and talk.

Suddenly, Erin saw someone come onto the porch.

It was Melissa. She stopped in the middle of the semicircle of furniture and bent over to catch her breath. The young British woman was dressed in a pair of long sleeve dark flannel pajamas and her hair was messily strewn about her head. She was panting heavily, like she'd just completed a marathon, but instead of a look of anguish, a broad smile was sported across her face and she was giggling uncontrollably between pants.

Erin was about to knock on the porch door to get her attention when another figure appeared in the porch entrance.

This must be her friend Marie.

The French woman had a devious expression on her face.

"A-HA CHERIE! THERE YOU ARE!"

Melissa turned to face her friend, still panting and giggling uncontrollably.

"Ha-ha-ha oh no *pant* hehehehe oh no *pant* *pant*"

"I am not done with you yet Cherie."

She took a step towards the panting British woman. Melissa stood upright and took a step back. Her panting had calmed down, but her giggling now began to pick up speed.

"He-he-he-he please no he-he-he-he no more."

Seeing her friend in this state of panic, Erin knew what was about to happen. She decided to............…...
1222312312.title: Head around to the back porch

choices: Do nothing. Marie pounced on her before she could do anything.
12223123122.content:
……………..not get involved just yet.

Luckily for Erin, the plants lining the windows of the porch provided ample cover and she was able to move to the side of the door and crouch down to witness what was about to unfold.

Through the leaves of the plants, she saw Marie take another menacing step towards Melissa. Melissa, still grinning and giggling, took another step back in turn, only to bump into the sofa behind her.

She knew she'd trapped herself. Marie knew it as well. The raven-haired French woman's eyes were deviously wild as she raised both her hands and began wiggling her fingers.

Melissa began to giggle uncontrollably as Marie took another step forward. The French woman was now two arm lengths away from her, her fingers still wiggling furiously in the air. The laughter from Melissa kicked up again, even though the wiggling fingers were not even touching her.

Marie smiled devilishly.

"You have nowhere to go Cherie. What will you do now?"

Melissa stood frozen in front of the sofa, her arms pinned at her sides. She was still giggling when she decided to...…............
12223123122.title: Crouch out of sight and watch

122231231221.content:
………….plead for mercy.

Slowly, she lifted her forearms up, keeping her elbows pinned to her sides. She took a deep breath and brought her giggling under control, so she could be clearly heard.

"I give up Marie. You win."

The French woman stopped wiggling her fingers and lowered her hands. A triumphant grin spread across her face.

"You surrender?"

Melissa nodded, keeping her forearms raised.

"I do. I give up. I surrender."

Marie scratched her chin thoughtfully.
122231231221.title: Attempt to surrender

1222312312212.content:
Marie then shook her head.

"I don't believe you."

Melissa looked confused.

"What?"

"You heard me. I don't believe you. I need more proof."

"Like?"

Marie grinned. She pointed at Melissa's arms.

"Raise them higher."

Melissa grinned sheepishly. Slowly, she detached her elbows from her sides and brought them level with her shoulders. Her forearms were kept upright at a right angle.

"That better?"

Marie shook her head.

"Higher."

Melissa snickered and raised her arms straight above her head, as if there was an invisible rope from the ceiling keeping them there.

Erin now saw why Marie asked her to do this.

With her arms straight over her head, Melissa's dark flannel pajama top had risen above her pajama pants, exposing Melissa's tummy and bellybutton.

The devilish grin returned to Marie's face.

Melissa gulped.

"Better now? Do you accept my surrender?"

Marie rubbed her chin thoughtfully and said...………….......
1222312312212.title: I don't believe you

choices: Pin Melissa's arms over her head and tickle her belly more
Sit on her legs and tickle her bare feet
12223123122122.content:
…………"NO."

Melissa's eyes went wide, as Marie with lightening speed leapt forward and began furiously tickling Melissa's defenseless bare sides. Melissa threw her head back in hysterical laughter, as Marie managed to slip her fingers under the flannel pajama top right as Melissa was bringing her arms down.

The giggling British woman twisted and turned in a vain attempt to escape the tickling fingers. Unfortunately, Marie had been too quick. Her fingers had free rein to tickle Melissa's bare torso, while Melissa could do nothing but wiggle in hysterical laughter.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHEHEHEHEHE! 34;

"I got you didn't I? Why would I stop now?!"

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHA STOP STOP AHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHHHAHAH!"

Melissa fell back onto the sofa, continuing to squirm as Marie tickled her bare belly. The French woman grinned deviously as she stood over the writhing frame of her ticklish friend, never once letting up on her furious assault.

"Didn't you miss me Cherie?"

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA NO NO HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAA"

"No?! I'll show you!"

Marie slid her finger further up Melissa's torso and found Melissa's armpits, sending the British woman's laughter up another octave.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAH NO NO NOT THERE HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"

"Do you take it back? Did you miss me?"

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA NO I DIDN'T HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHHAA!"

"Hmph. Well I'll have to try something new."

That's when Marie decided to...…............................
12223123122122.title: No

1223.content:
......................Melissa with her arms folded beneath her and her head resting on top.

The British woman was sound asleep.

Erin tiptoed over to her and gently shook her shoulders.

"Melissa....wake up."

Melissa's head rose quickly. She rubbed her eyes and let out an enormous yawn.

"Erin! I can't believe it's you!" Melissa said, rising to embrace her friend, "Good lord, how long was I asleep? What time is it?"

Erin checked her watch.

"Almost six. Why?"

Melissa went back to her desk and checked her phone.

"Strange. She should've texted me by now?"

"Who?" Erin asked.
1223.title: Melissa asleep behind the desk

12231.content:
"My cousin," Melissa replied, "She's flying in from Wales. Her plane was supposed to have landed at 5:30. She said she'd text me when she landed."

"Which cousin?" Erin asked.

"Emilia Cornwall," Melissa answered, "she's a very wealthy woman. Single mom like me. Her daughter, Kay, doing a summer semester at college, so she's alone for the summer. I invited her out to spend time. Keep both of us company. Plus....she needs to hide out for a while."

Erin eyed her friend suspiciously.

"Hide out?"

Melissa nodded gravely.

"Yes. Serious situation. She's been getting weird letters in the mail. She got an inheritance from a distant relative of her fathers. Several of the family members disputed it.....particularly her aunt. Emilia's been paranoid about it. Even hired a bodyguard."

"Really?"

"Yeah. Tough woman too. She's an ex-MMA fighter. The two of them are coming. Let things cool down a bit."

Just as Melissa finished speaking, her phone rang.

On the phone screen, the following name appeared.....................
12231.title: My cousin

choices: Mystery person who has been watching them the whole time
122311.content:
................."EMILIA."

"Hold on Erin," Melissa said, moving away from her desk, "I need to take this."

Melissa walked to a corner of the room before she began talking.

"Emilia?"

"Hey Melissa!" came the reply from the other end, "How are you?"

"Good. Did you just land?"

"We did. We're actually on our way to you house now."

Melissa was surprised by the revelation.

"I thought I was picking you up at the airport."

"Change of plans," Emilia replied, her voice lowering, "we rented a car under my bodyguard's name. She's driving me now."

"Why'd you rent a car? You didn't need to do that?"

Emilia's voice carried a concerned tone to it.

"Bodyguard figured it'd be a safer idea. When we left this morning, we found another note in the mail threatening to kidnap me. Since then we've taken every precaution. If someone manages to track me here, they'll be looking for my name under anything. That's why Jess offered to put her name down for the rental. They don't know I hired her......least I don't think. Plus I don't want them knowing what your car looks like anyway."

Now it was Melissa's turn to look concerned.

"Should I be worried?"

"I don't think so," Emilia replied, "we were extremely careful. In any event, we should be at your house in about five minutes. We'll be waiting out front when you get here."

"Oh don't both waiting," Melissa replied, "I keep a spare house key under the front doormat. Let yourselves in. I'm closing down now, so I should be home in twenty."

"Great. See you then."

The call ended and Melisa returned to Erin.

"Looks like I've got company arriving sooner than I thought. Want to join us for dinner at the house?"

Erin thought for a moment.

"I may grab something in town. Is it all right if I come over later?"

"Of course," said Melissa, "come by any time."

With this agreement made, Melissa closed down her shop for the night and the two women prepared to go their separate ways.

For continued adventures, we decided to follow..................................
122311.title: Emilia

choices: A masked woman waiting behind the door
1223112.content:
................Melissa as she pulls into her driveway to begin her restful evening and visit with her cousin.

The British woman noticed a few of the lights in the house were on and saw the silver rental car in her driveway. Her company must already have begun to settle in.

Opening the front door, Melissa heard...............................
1223112.title: Melissa

12231122.content:
.................the creaking of the floor boards upstairs.

Melissa moved through her living room and up the stairwell, where she could hear the muffled sound of voices.

"Emilia?" Melissa called, "You up here?"

A voice came in reply. It was....................
12231122.title: Movement upstairs

122311221.content:
.....................her cousin.

"Yes we're here. Just finished changing in the guestroom."

Melissa moved down the hallway and found the guestroom door wide open.

Inside the room was the 46 year old Welsh woman, Emilia Knox, Melissa's cousin. The single mother was barefoot and draped in a pair of long sleeve pajamas.

She turned at the sound of Melissa's footsteps and embraced her cousin the moment she entered.

"Good to see you Melissa?"

"You too! Are you going to bed this early?"

Emilia shrugged.

"Getting ready at least. The flight was exhausting. I couldn't stay asleep for more than five minutes."

"I know the feeling," Melissa said, walking over to a small closet in the room, "I actually have some sleep aid stuff in here if that'll help."

Emilia shook her head.

"Oh no I slept soundly. Jess was the reason I couldn't sleep."

"Where is she anyway?"

Emilia motioned to the closed bathroom door on the wall behind her.

"Changing in the bathroom."

"What did Jess do during the flight?"

A slight blush entered Emilia cheeks.

"I was seated by the window. Every time I would lay my head down and sleep........Jess would pull the lap belt over my arms to keep them pinned. Then........she'd start tickling me on my legs, neck........and my BELLY."

Melissa laughed.

"It's funny to you. Try waking up every five minutes a giggling mess because your bodyguard keeps tickling your tummy. Kay's such a bad influence on her. The two of them gang up on me all the time."

Out of the corner of her eye, Melissa saw the bathroom door slowly open. The movement was so silent, it didn't rouse Emilia attention.

The muscular frame of Jess the bodyguard came into view. The ex-MMA fighter was dressed in a white hoodie croptop and sweatpants. She tiptoed on her barefeet closer to Emilia, who remained oblivious of her presence.

Jess indicated Melissa to keep quiet and wiggled her fingers in Emilia's direction. Melissa stifled a grin and kept the conversation going.

"You must be exhausted then."

Emilia nodded and let out a yawn. She slowly stretched her arms high above her head. From this position, her long sleeve pajama top rose high above her bellybutton, leaving her pale pot belly completely exposed.

Jess grinned evilly and lunged forward tickling.........................
122311221.title: Emilia

1223112212.content:
...............the bare belly of the 46 year old Welsh woman.

Emilia's eyes nearly bugged out of their sockets as she felt Jess's fingers start furiously tickling her stomach. The Welsh woman brought her arms down in a vain attempt to protect herself. Her bodyguard had her hands perfectly placed to tickle Emilia's bare belly uninterrupted.

"Gotcha again Ms. Knox!" Jess declared triumphantly.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAOHNOHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHHA!"
Melissa stifled a smirk, as she watched her cousin get turned into a thrashing giggling mess, as the bodyguard relentlessly tickled her tummy. With no hope of escape, and the thrashing useless, Emilia fell to her knees and then onto the ground, helpless laughing as every inch of her tummy was tickled. Jess followed the giggling Welsh woman to the ground, tickling every inch of the woman's ticklish cubby torso. Melissa shivered as she watched, wrapping her arms around her own stomach. As kids, Emilia and her were tickled by everybody, especially on their bellies and feet. Seeing the scene before her only brought those memories.

Meanwhile, Emilia was turning beet red as she laughed.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHEHEHEHEHEHHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEJESSSTOPHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHH! "

"Tickle tickle, Ms. Knox," Jess teased, "I told you I'd get you again."

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH YES YES HAHAHAHAHAHAAHNOW STOP!"

"Hmmm stop?" Jess pondered, staring devilishly at Melissa, "I don't know."

"HAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHHAHAHAHAH PLEASE I'LL DO ANYTHING AHHAHAHAHAHAHHHHAHAH!"

"Anything?"

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA YES YES HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHHAAHHHAHH!"

"Hmmmmmm," Jess murmued, "Ok. Deal."

The tickling attack stopped. Emilia lay giggling and rolling on the floor for a few moments, before Jess submitted her request.

"All right, Ms. Knox. I want you to.................."
1223112212.title: The belly

choices: Bring the key and Erin with her
122312.content:
....................."Unknown Number."

Curious, Melissa answered.

"Hello?"

The voice on the other side was low and grave.

"We have your cousin."

"Who is this?"

"Stop. No questions. Just know that we have your cousin and her bodyguard. They will not be released until our demands are met."

Melissa moved a little ways from Erin and spoke low into the phone.

"What demands?"

"I'm told you are the owner of an antiques shop is that correct?"

"Yes."

"Good. So Emilia wasn't lying. There is a small key that she mailed to you for safe keeping didn/t she?"

Melissa paused.

"Yes."

"That key is to the lockbox in her bank vault. We already got the account number and pin from her, but we didn't know about the lockbox. Bring that key to the address I text to your number in the next hour. If that happens, we will let her go."

"And if I refuse?"

A low laugh came from the other end.

"I'll let you hear for yourself."

A few muffled orders were heard in the background, followed by the sounds of hysterical laughter.

"HAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAH OH NO HAHAHAHAHAHAHAH WE TOLD YOU EVERYTHING HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHA!"

The voice returned.

"They'll endure this until you show up. You have one hour. If we even suspect that you've called the police, we'll have the two of them removed. You'll never see them again. The address will be forthcoming."

The call ended.

Melissa hung up the phone and told Erin about the conversation.

"What will you do?"

Before Melissa could answer, a text message came through. The address:

"1 DOCKWAY ROAD"

"That's the warehouse by the pier." Erin surmised. "What should be we do?"

Melissa went to her desk and removed the key that the voice demanded. She then decided to...............
122312.title: Unknown Number

1223123.content:
.........................comply with the orders.

"I've got to bring this to them. I don't have a choice."

Erin agreed.

"I'll go with you. Best not to do this alone."

Melissa thanked her. The two women then locked up the shop and hopped into Erin's car, driving off towards the pier.
------
The old pier at 1 Dockway Road was at a secluded part of the island. No one was around for miles.

Stopping short of a run down chain link fence, Erin and Melissa could see the ominous silhouette of the old warehouse. Strangely there were no other vehicle around. No cars in the weed infested parking lot and no boats docked by the rickety old pier.

Melissa shook her head.

"This is strange."

"What is?"

"It looks like there's no one here. How do we know Emilia and her bodyguard are even here?"

"Call the number back."

Melissa took out her phone and redialed the restricted number. The voice returned.

"Are you here?"

"Yes......but"

"What?"

Melissa hesitated.

"I don't see anyone. How do I know Emilia's really in there?"

The voice chuckled.

"I guess you'll have to trust me."

Melissa and Erin exchanged a nervous glance. Then Melissa got an idea.

"I want to see them first."

"What?"

"You heard me. I want to see them both first before I bring over anything. Let me see them........and then I will give you the key."

Silence came from the other end for a few agonizing moments.

FInally, the voice returned.

"Agreed."

The phone hung up. In the distance, the front door of the warehouse creaked open.

Melissa thrust the key over to Erin.

"Hold this."

"What why?"

"I don't trust this person. If they're not in there, I don't want to give up the key. I need to make sure they're there."

"What if something happens to you?"

"They don't know YOU'RE here. If I go in and don't come out in ten minutes.......call the police."

Erin nodded.

Melissa slipped through the broken down chain link fence and disappeared behind the warehouse door.

Erin waited patiently until.....................
1223123.title: Bring the key and Erin with her

choices: A knock at the front door
123.content:
…………...…….kick back and allow herself so time to relax.

Plopping down onto her bed, Erin allowed her body to sink into the soft mattress and her mind to release all thoughts. Her eyelids began to feel heavier with each second and before she knew it, she drifted off to sleep.

After a few hours, Erin was suddenly jolted awake.

She sat up in bed, her ears perked up to any and all sounds. A few moments of silence passed before the sound repeated.

It was...…………………………...
123.title: Take a nap

choices: A woman in a business suit
1232.content:
……………….coming from downstairs.

Someone was knocking at the front door.

Slowly and still groggy, Erin rose from her bed and trotted down the stairs. By now, it was just reaching late afternoon and the sun was beginning to fall behind the horizon. The harsh rays of the setting sun were shining through her windows, as Erin reached the front door and threw it open.

On the other side, she was greeted by...…………………………...………………..
1232.title: A knock at the front door

12321.content:
.......................a young woman dressed in a nice business suit.

She smiled broadly at Erin.

"Good evening ma'am! How are you?"

"Good thanks. How can I help you?"

The woman reached into her pocket and handed Erin a business card. The card read "HARRIET HILDEGAARD HYPNOTICS."

"Name's Harriet," the woman said shaking Erin's hand, "I sell relaxation options door to door. Everything from crystals to sessions in hypnosis."

"Hypnosis?"

"Yes! I'm a bona fide hypnotist. I've helped dozens of people overcome some of their worst anxieties with it! I'm offering free consultations to all small business owners here on the island?"

Erin shot Harriet a look of confusion.

"Business owners? I.....don't own my own business."

Now it was Harriet's turn to look confused. She pulled out her phone and checked something on the screen.

"I'm sorry ma'am, maybe I made a mistake. Is this the house of Melissa Cornwall?"

Melissa Cornwall, the young British single mother, lived next door to Erin and ran a profitable antiques shop on the island. Not surprisingly, she was always the target of solicitors and opportunists who wanted to be involved with her business somehow. This was actually not the first time that Erin's home had been confused by such an occasion.

"Sorry. Wrong house."

"Oh. That's embarrassing. Do you happen to know where she lives?"

This put Erin in a tough spot. Once business hours ended, Melissa always enjoyed spending her time at home in peace during the summer with her daughter, Catherine, and her niece, Sarah, who always visited the island in the summers. Erin knew that Melissa likely wouldn't want to be bothered...........though the saleswoman had been polite and seemed harmless enough.

Erin decided to.......................
12321.title: A saleswoman

123211.content:
................help the salewoman out. Melissa could always sort it out.

Erin stepped out onto her front porch and pointed to the house next door. All the lights in the house were on and there were three cars parked in the driveway, meaning Sarah, Catherine and Melissa were all at home

"Melissa lives right over there."

Harriet smiled and shook Erin's hand again.

"Thanks a bunch ma'am. Have a good night. Sorry I bothered you."

Harriet hopped off the porch and made her way to Melissa's house. Erin watched her curiously for a few moments before going back inside.

Plopping herself down on the couch, Erin turned on the TV to the evening news.

Immediately, her house was flooded with the dramatic entrance music to the news. The male news anchor shuffled the papers in front of him with a grim expression.

"Top story this evening, another hit in what has become a string of robberies taking place over the island. A young woman, Amanda Kissinger, reported the theft of her jewelry to police earlier this morning. Ms. Kissinger claims to have no memory of what happened. She had this to say to our local news reporter."

The camera cuts to the image of a twenty three year old woman sporting a distraught look.

"I'd gotten home from work and heard a knock at the door. Lady on the other side was friendly, saying she was lost and needed directions. Next thing I know.......I woke up on my couch five hours later. All the jewelry in my bedroom was missing. I.....had no idea how it was found. I keep it hidden."

Off camera you can hear a reporter's voice.

"Was it the woman who knocked on the door?"

Amanda shrugs.

"No idea. Could be. Could not. I barely even remember her face. All I know was I answered the door and.......everything went blank. Only thing I knew was my stomach was aching.......like I'd been laughing really hard."

Cut back to the anchor in the studio.

"Similar stories have been reported in the area. We warn our listeners that if you spot anything suspicious.....contact the local police immediately."

Erin rolled her eyes at the TV and switched to a more relaxing sitcom. Her head was already filled with horrific stories from the news.......she wanted relaxation.

After an hour or so......a knock came at her door again.

Erin answered and on the other side found....................
123211.title: Tell her where Melissa lived

1232111.content:
.....................Sarah Cornwall, Melissa's niece.

"Hey Sarah!" Erin beamed.

The girl motioned for Erin to keep her voice down. She looked frantically over her shoulder, as if to make sure she wasn't being followed.

"Is everything......"

"Shh!" the young girl snapped.

She looked over her shoulder again. Once she was sure she was alone, she turned back to Erin. She had a panicked expression on her face.

"I need to come inside."

Erin nodded and allowed the girl to pass by. She closed the door behind her.

Sarah immediately walked over to the window in Erin's living room and peered through the closed blinds in the direction of Melissa's house. The young girl was dressed strangely to be out. She was barefoot and in a pair of long sleeve flannel pajamas, as if she had just settled in for the night.

Erin stared at the girl with concern.

"Sarah.....are you okay? What's going on?"

Taking a deep breath, Sarah moved from the window and sat down on the sofa. She motioned for Erin to sit beside her. Once Erin did.......Sarah began her story.

"Did a saleswoman come by here?"

Erin nodded.

"We need to call the police."

"What.....why? What's wrong?"

Sarah looked at Erin gravely.

"She's the woman on the news they're talking about. I know it."

"How do you........"

"She hypnotized Aunt Melissa and Catherine. I just changed into my pajamas. I was getting ready to go downstairs, when I heard people coming up the stairs. I thought it was just Aunt Melissa and Catherine......until I heard another voice behind them. I shut the lights off in my room and peeked through a crack in the door. It was the weirdest thing......"

"What?

"Aunt Melissa and Catherine. They were walking up the stairs. They had their arms raised straight up over their head. Like they were being held up by robbers. But............they didn't look scared. They had this blank look on their face. The woman behind them was ordering them to move ahead and stop at the top of the stairs. She wasn't yelling. She didn't have a weapon. She just asked nicely.....and they did it."

"Then what?"

"Well,,,,,,,she lined Aunt Melissa and Catherine next to each other. She made them keep their arms raised. Then she started asking Aunt Melissa where her jewels and money were. Aunt Melissa kept shaking her head no. So did Catherine. The woman then said that she was gonna make them tell her.........whether they wanted to or not......"

Erin took a few seconds to absorb all that. She felt a twinge of guilt, as she was the one who had pointed the woman in that direction in the first place.

"We need to call the police." Erin decided.

Sarah shook her head.

"No. We can't."

"Why not? They need to be told!"

"They'll take too long to get here! She's torturing them right now! I need your help to stop her. We can take her down. If we call the cops........they may be too late. I came over here for you to help me. Will you?"

Erin decides to...................
1232111.title: Sarah Cornwall

choices: Melissa and Catherine were tied up
They could hear hysterical laughter from upstairs
12321111.content:
..........................help.

"All right," Erin agreed. "I don't like the idea. But if we can't figure out a way.......then we call the police."

"Deal."

The two women slipped out the back door of Erin's house. Sarah motioned for Erin to follow her through Melissa's backyard. There was a side door that was unlocked that would allow them to slip back into the house unnoticed.

Slowly opening the side door, the two women passed into the house uninhibited.

Tiptoeing through the hallway they entered the living room, where....................................
12321111.title: Help her

123211112.content:
.................they heard muffled grunts.

Over on the sofa, sat Catherine and Melissa. The two women were seated next to each other, both barefoot and dressed in long flannel pajamas. Their hands were in their laps, tied together at the wrists, while their bare feet were propped up on the coffee table in front of them, tied at the ankles.

Both women were blindfolded and had a hankerchief tied around their mouths.

Neither of them had heard the two women enter.

"What should we do?" Sarah whispered.

Erin decided....................
123211112.title: Melissa and Catherine were tied up

1232111121.content:
...............remove the hankerchief around Melissa's mouth. Melissa shook her head furiously as the cloth was being removed.

Erin put her hand gently on Melissa's shoulder.

"Melissa," she whispered, "it's Erin and Sarah. We're gonna get you two out of this."

Melissa continued to shake her head.

"No!" she replied in a harsh whisper, "you'll set off the trap!"

Erin and Sarah exchanged confused glances.

"What trap?"

Erin removed Melissa's blindfold. The British woman had a terrified look in her eyes.

"She set a hypnosis trap. Catherine and I can't be moved from here or untied. If either of us is.......the trap springs."

Erin gestured to the room in front of her.

"Melissa.......there's no trap. It's just us four."

Melissa shook her head.

"There is. It's called the 'Tickle Bug Trap.'"

"The what?"

"Tickle Bug Trap. If someone frees us, then we will be frozen where we stand. Unable to move any part of us. Then.....the most ticklish part of our body will feel like there are thousands of tiny bugs crawling across it, tickling us like crazy."

"That's ridiculous!"

"It's not," Melissa warned, "she already demonstrated it. If you free me.......I'll be stuck in a position where my most ticklish spot is exposed. I won't be able to cover it. And the harder I laugh, the more intense the tickling gets. And NO ONE will be able to carry me out."

"Why?"

Melissa looked over at the stairs to make sure Harriet was not there.

"It's something she calls "Transfer Hypnosis." If anyone touches me.....they become hypnotized as well. The bugs will crawl onto you. Find where you're most ticklish. You'll be left helpless."

"Melissa that's......."

"Please! Find Harriet. Get her to undo this. Do not move or untie either of us until you do!"

Erin and Sarah shrug. They do not want to risk alarming Harriet.

"All right," Erin agreed, "Is Harriet upstairs?"

Melissa nods.

"Ok." Erin began, "I say one of us goes up there and surprises her?"

"What?" Sarah protested, "Why not both?"

"She's right," Melissa warned, "she's a clever one. She could easily surprise both of you. If she does.....no one can help us. If she catches one of you.......the other may still have a chance."

Reluctantly, both Sarah and Erin agree.

Who will go upstairs to hunt Harriet?
1232111121.title: Untie Melissa

12321111212.content:
Erin being the oldest volunteers to go.

Ordering Sarah to remain out of sight downstairs, Erin slowly creeps through the living room and disappears up th stairs.

Where do we go from here?
12321111212.title: Erin

choices: Stop. She has a new idea!
123211112121.content:
Sarah ducks on the other side of the sofa and keeps out of sight.

Before she makes herself comfortable, Melissa whispers back at her.

"Psst! Sarah! Psst!"

"What?"

"The blindfold. Hankerchief. You need to put them back on me."

"Why?"

"She'll know you're down here!"

"Erin could have always done it."

Melissa rolls her eyes.

"In any case, I don't want to risk setting off the tickle trap! Just.......put me back the way I was."

Sarah checks around her to make sure the coast is clear. She then decides to...............
123211112121.title: Stay with Sarah

1232111121212.content:
..............do nothing.

A brilliant idea has come to her.

"Hold on Aunt Melissa."

She pulls out her phone and conducts some research.

"I've got it!" she exclaims after a few moments.

"What?" Melissa asks.

"It's all right here. Hypnosis can be broken without Harriet. It's all about your mental focus?"

"What are you talking about?"

"I can untie you Aunt Melissa. All you need to do is to keep your mind focused on something else. Hypnosis only has power as long as allow it to occupy your mind. If you keep repeating something, counting, whatever, that will keep you busy. We just need to keep you busy until we can get you and Catherine to Erin's house."

Melissa hesitated.

"I don't know........"

"Let's try it. I can't stand to see you tied up. Pleeeeease."

Melissa sighed. She looked at her niece's genuine look and relented.

"All right." she said, "Let's give it a try."

Gleefully Sarah sprints into the kitchen and returns with a knife.

"Okay." she said, "Which one first?"
1232111121212.title: Stop. She has a new idea!

12321111212121.content:
"Ankles." Melissa decided.

Slowly, Sarah cut the ties around Melissa's bare ankles. After a few seconds the ropes fell limply to the table.

Melissa and Sarah looked at each other......waiting to see what happened.

After a few seconds...............
12321111212121.title: Ankles

choices: Melissa is caught in the tickle trap
123211112121211.content:
...............nothing happens.

Melissa looks at her bare feet curiously. She wiggles one foot. Then the other.

Nothing.

"Huh," Melissa sighs, "Maybe you were right."

"Maybe," Sarah mused, "In any case, start counting under your breath while I untie your wrists. We need to keep you focused."

Obediently, Melissa started counting quietly, as Sarah untied her wrists.

Again.....nothing happened.

Slowly rising from her seat, Melissa walks past Sarah and around the coffee table, still counting quietly.

Once she gets past the table........nothing happens.

Relieved, Melissa tells Sarah they need to untie Catherine as well.

Just as Sarah starts to do so...............
123211112121211.title: Nothing happened

choices: Her arms are pulled above her head
She sits down on the rug with her feet in front of her
1232111121212111.content:
................she hears Melissa utter a sudden horrific gasp.

"What is it?" Sarah asked.

Melissa's eyes are wide.

"I.......can't move my legs."

Melissa is standing with her legs together in the middle of the room. She struggled to lift her feet from the rug, but finds that they cannot be moved.

"The trap....." Melissa whispers. "She was right."

Suddenly, Melissa's eyes close. She's beginning to enter the trance.

Immediately...............
1232111121212111.title: Melissa is caught in the tickle trap

12321111212121111.content:
....................Melissa's arms are stretched high above her head, as if being pulled from a rope in the ceiling.

Her arms go higher and higher, causing her flannel pajama top to rise above her bellybutton.

"Oh no......" Melissa murmurs, "it's starting. I can heheehhe feel the tickle bugs."

Sarah moves closer to Melissa.

"Where? Where are they?"
12321111212121111.title: Her arms are pulled above her head

choices: Carry Melissa out of the house
Run out of the house to get help
123211112121211112.content:
Melissa does her best to suppress a wide grin and the laughter that is rising in her throat.

"My be-hehehehe-lly," she giggles and gasps, "I can fe-hehhehehehheehehe-el them all over my belly!"

Sarah cringed. She knew Melissa's belly was her worst spot. Catherine and her would spend countless hours during the summer tickling Melissa. Her tummy was always their favorite target. Her serious British aunt would turn from stern to a mess of giggles within minutes of them tickling her belly.

Sarah knew that she had to do something. Melissa wouldn't be able to keep her laughter under control for long.

"Aunt Melissa. Hold on. I'll figure something out."

Melissa continued to fight the giggling. Tears were forming in the corners of her closed eyes. Her pale exposed belly was twitching as if thousands of legged creatures were gently tickling her.

"Hehehe hu-hahahaha-rry hehehehehehehehehehe! Oh hahahahahahahhahah they're on my ri-hehehehehebs! Ehehehehehe oh no no no not my bellybutton too-ohohohohohohohohohohhoho no there hahahahahahahahaahha!"

Now Sarah began to panic. If her bellybutton was being targeted, time was ticking. Earlier that day Sarah had poked Melissa's bellybutton while she was sunbathing out back. The British woman went from relaxed to a curled up ball on the ground in a matter of seconds.

As Sarah's mind races furiously for a solution, Melissa's giggling starts to increase. Her tummy twitches more violently as the tickles seem to increase. She can barely manage to speak.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHHUUUURRRYHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHHAHHHAHAHAH!"

That's when Sarah decides to..................
123211112121211112.title: My belly

choices: Harriet tickling both Catherine and Melissa
123211113.content:
.....................peals of laughter could be heard from upstairs.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA OH NO NOHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHH!"

Erin and Sarah exchange nervous glances.

"What do we do?" Sarah asked.

Erin takes a moment to think.

"One of us should try and surprise her," Erin said, "I'll go upstairs and find out where they are. You find something we can use to tie her down. I'll see if I can get a drop on her."

Sarah agrees and disappears out of the room.

Slowly Erin begins creeping up the stairs. The laughter rings louder and louder as she climbs.

Lying low, Erin sees the door to the guestroom wide open. This appears to be where the laughing is coming from.

Moving over to the open doorway, Erin sees....................
123211113.title: They could hear hysterical laughter from upstairs

1232111131.content:
................a very strange sight.

Melissa, dressed in long sleeve flannel pajamas, lying flat on the rug of the guest room. Her eyes are shut and her entire body is perfectly rigid and still. Her arms are lying tight against her sides and her legs up to her ankles are motionless on the floor. The only parts of her body moving are her mouth, which is wide open with raucous laughter and the soles and toes of her bare feet, which are being mercilessly tickled by her blond haired daughter, Catherine.

Catherine, with a glazed look in her eyes, is sitting cross-legged in front of Melissa's feet. She is slumped slightly forward, but her face contains a vacant expression. She is as still as a statue.......expect for her outstretch hands, whose fingers are gently tickling her mom's feet and toes.

Near the doorway on the inside of the room, the saleswoman Harriet, looks on with an amused grin.

"My dear Melissa," Harriet mused, "I TOLD you you could both be hypnotized. No one is smart enough to resist it."

Hoarse belly laughter emanated from Melissa's mouth, while the rest of her body remained perfectly still, as if it was glued completely to the floor.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHA OH NO HAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAH WHO'S TICKLING MY FEET HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA MAKE THEM STOP HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAH!"

"'Don't make me laugh' you said," Harriet chuckled, ignoring Melissa's pleas, "So......challenge accepted. And I didn't even need to lift a finger. Your daughter provided all ten for me."

"HHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAAA 34;

Harriet now moved closer to the giggling British woman. She crouched down beside her.

"Course you could've given me the location of your jewels and we'd be fine. But no.......even under hypnosis you somehow managed to refuse. I warned you I'd tickle it out of you.....but you didn't budge. Insisted you weren't ticklish. Liar. Luckily........I got what I wanted anyway. A nice little tickle toy and a wonderful tickler. She's so obedient. Watch."

Leaning over to Catherine, Harriet issued her orders.

"Catherine," she commanded, "just her toes."

Obediently, all ten of Catherine's fingers converged on the British woman's toes. Her nails dug beneath all of them, sending Melissa into hysterics.

"HAHAHAHEHEHEHEHHAHEHHEHEHE OH NO NO HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAAHHHHHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"

"Voila. Nothing to it. Now Catherine...............heels."

Without missing a step, the ten fingers of the blond haired British girl moved south to the heels of her mother's feet. Melissa continued to giggle furiously.

"HEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHE!"

"Now.........sides of the feet Catherine."

The ten fingers split, five to the side of each foot. Melissa belly laughter filled the room as the torture continued.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAH!"

Harriet now turned to Catherine and snapped her fingers.

"We can stop for now Catherine."

Immediately, the tickling stopped. Catherine removed her finger and placed her hands in her lap. She sat perfectly still......awaiting Harriet's next instructions when they came.

Melissa was now panting and giggling from the break. Harriet moved closer to her head.

"Can you hear me, Melissa?"

"Hehehehe *pant* hehehehehe yes."

"Good."

Harriet now leaned close to Melissa's face.

"When I snap my fingers......you will be able to move your head. Your eyes are still frozen shut. Your torso, arms, legs and neck are still frozen and immovable. When I snap my fingers, only your mouth, ears, head and feet can be moved. Do you understand?"

"Hehe yes."

Harriet snapped her fingers. Slowly Melissa lifted her head up. Her hair was matted and covered in sweat.

"Hehehehe I....I can't take it anymore."

"Then......you are ready to tell me where you hide your jewelry?"

"Hehehe....I ......can't."

Harriet looked disappointed.

"Why?"

"Hehehe they're from my grandmother. Very old. I can't let you take them. I can't tell you where they are."

Harriet leans closer to Melissa. Just as she is about to talk again..................
1232111131.title: Catherine tickling Melissa

12321111311.content:
..................Erin moves further from the door. She is too worried about giving herself away.

Harriet continues unabaded.

"Melissa my dear," Harriet mused, "of course you can. I will get it sooner or later. You can't move. And I know your weakness."

Melissa shook her head defiantly.

A look of concern spread over Melissa's face.

"Wha....what conversation?"

"In a second dear. But first......when I snap my fingers, your head will be frozen again. But now, your neck will unfreeze. You will be able to move your neck, mouth, ears and feet."

Her fingers snapped. Melissa's head plopped back to the floor.

Reaching into her pocket, Harriet removed a small feather which she gently dragged across Melissa neck.

"He-hehehey hehehehe," Melissa snickered, "cut it out heheheheheheehehe."

Harriet smiled.

"Just like your daughter said. Under hypnosis I asked her what her favorite thing to do with you is. And you know what she said?"
