"Tickle you. All day long. She told me ALL the stories. How she chases you around the yard tickling you. How hysterically you laugh when you get pedicures. Makes you sit in the corner of the booth at restaurants so she can poke you. How she traps your feet under the table at dinner and scratches them with a fork. She LOVES tickling you. Even something like.....taking a feather when you sleep to drag across your neck and make you giggle."

The feather is brought again across Melissa's neck. It brushes gently back and forth, teasing the British woman and making her snicker and giggle.

"Heheheh cut it out heheheheheheehehehehehehehe."

Harriet takes the feather away again.

"But most of all..............she told me ALL your ticklish spots. That's how I knew to go for your feet and toes. But.......remember, she told me ALL of them."

Harriet now leans forward and speaks into Melissa's ear in a harsh whisper.

"ALL of them."

Melissa's mouth says firm and resolute.

"No idea what you're talking about."

"Oh REALLY. I think you do. In fact......let's see."

Harriet moves away from Melissa.

"When I snap my fingers......you neck will freeze again. You will now only be able to move your mouth, ears, feet..........and your most TICKLISH spot on your body."

Harriet snapped her fingers. Melissa gulped.

"I.....don't feel anything."

"We'll see."

Slowly, Harriet moved her hands towards.....................
12321111311.title: Erin remains still

123211113112.content:
................the bottom of Melissa's flannel pajama top.

Slowly she lifted it until it was right above the British woman's bellybutton. Then she gently placed five fingers right on her bare stomach, twitching each of her fingers into the ticklish skin.

An enormous grin crossed Melissa's face. She gritted her teeth as Harriet's five fingers lightly wiggled across her abs and tummy fat. Suppressed giggles, snorts and snickers began to eek from her mouth.

"*snort* heheheheheheheheeheheh oh no heheheheheheeheheheheheheheheheehehe"

Harriet brought her fingers back off the bare belly.

"That's right," she teased, "your daughter told me all about your chubby ticklish tummy. Her favorite spot to get you. Every time you go to stretch and raise your arms.......she squeezes your sides. At the pool in your bikini sunbathing, she spider tickles your abs and love handles. Playing basketball when she was younger.......your defense never stood a chance. You'd raise your arms, she'd drop the ball and tickle your belly until you rolled to the ground. And then there's your 'Tickle Button.'"

Gently, Harriet lowered a finger to the edge of the British woman's bellybutton and slowly circled it. Melissa's grin came back, wider than before, and her belly began to jiggle and twitch with ticklish laughter.

"HA! Hahahahahahahahaahahahaha!"

"That's the one!" Harriet announced, moving her finger from the bellybutton and lightly poking all exposed tummy skin.

Melissa's giggled hysterically as her tummy was poked.

"Hehehehehehohohoheheheheheheheheheheheehehehe stop i hate that heheeheheheheheheheheheeh! Leave my fat alone heheheheheheheehehehehehehehehe!"

Harriet laughed.

"She said you always say that!" Harriet mused, continuing to poke Melissa's belly, "All it takes is a wiggle, a poke or a scratch. The minute she touches your tummy, you turn to jello. And speaking of scratch.........."

The poking stops.

"She even told me about the 'Giggle Game.'"

Melissa groaned.

"Oh no. Not that. I hate that."

"I know," Harriet grinned maliciously, "her FAVORITE thing above all else. In quiet public places. Where everyone stares at the slightest noise that breaks the silence. She tries to make you giggle loud enough for people to pay attention. And she said you make it tougher now. You wear thick sweaters, ponchos, jackets.......all to protect your tummy. Of course.....she cheats you."

"What? How?"

"Your sweater, jackets, etc that all have to be washed. She puts them in the wrong cycles. Let's them shrink. You think you're gaining weight......when the clothes are shrinking."

"Why that little....hehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehe."

Harriet cuts her short. She scratches Melissa's love handles, amused at the helpless giggling.

"She is evil isn't she?" Harriet muses, continuing to scratch the belly, "All your thickest clothes, shrunk just enough so she can always get at your belly. Every time you raise and arm or shift, she waits to get a glimpse of your tummy so she can start the game."

The scrtaching stops. The finger moves to Melissa's bare side where it remains still.

"She waits until you aren't paying attention, then gets one of her fingers riiiight there. Then......she scratches. Lightly. Gently."

Her finger slowly moves. Melissa's grin comes back. Giggles come forth.

Harriet continues.

"She knows you won't yell at her. You don't want to draw attention. You try to ignore it. Pretend it doesn't tickle. So she goes.....faster.....and faster."

Harriet's finger picks up the pace as she speaks. Melissa holds on as best she could......but it cannot stop.

"Hehehehehehehehehehehehahahahahahahahahahahahahahs top it stop! Hahahahahahahaha!"

The scratching stops.

"Every time she gets you. She knows how ticklish you are......and now so do I. So I'll ask again."

She lowers the pajama top back down.

"Will you tell me where your jewelry is or do I need to continue?"

Melissa is silent a moment. Finally she says................

Hides and then attempts to wake Catherine
1232111131121.content:
........................yes.

Melissa takes a deep breath.

"Ok. I'll tell you."

"Smart move. Go on."

"My bedroom. Beneath the bed is a lockbox. Five digit combination."

Harriet grins and places her hand on top of Melissa's tummy again. She lets her finger sit and doesn't tickle. But Melissa can feel her fingers and starts helplessly giggling in anticipation.

"You're gonna tell me the combination right?"

"Ehehehehe yes yes eheheheheheheeheheheheheehe!"

If you attempt to run, scream or do anything other than that........I will tickle your bare belly until you turn to jello. Is that clear?"

Erin.........................

When Melissa was commanded to stand, Erin silently ducked into the empty room across the hallway. There she peeked around the corner in time to see the two exit towards Melissa bedroom.

1232111131121221.title: Yes

12323.content:
……………..a professional looking woman draped in a business suit.

She smiled when Erin opened the door and extended her hand in greeting.

"Good evening, miss. How are you doing?"

"Good," Erin responded, shaking her hand, "what can I do for you?"

Releasing Erin's hand, the business woman reached down to the briefcase that sat on the front stoop next to her feet. Picking the case up and popping it open, she removed a newspaper clipping. This clipping was handed to Erin.

"Do you recognize the woman in this article?"

Erin glanced down at the article. There was picture of a young hippie woman with a large oak tree rising behind her. The hippie woman looked like she was in her early thirties and was dressed in a pair of bell-bottom jeans, baja hoodie and beret. Her feet were bare and her arms were dangling at her side. On each wrist was a handcuff attached to a chain that was wrapped around the tree.

The headline read "MALL CONSTRUCTION HALTED DUE TO PROTEST."

Erin recognized the woman. She was Brenna Carmichael, the owner of a small hipster café downtown. Ever the active in island politics, Brenna was always involved in one matter or another, never afraid to put herself on the front line.

"I know her," Erin said after a bit, "she owns the Avocado Café in town. Why do you ask?"

"She's a menace," the businesswoman replied, taking the article back, "I work for the Cosquillas Island Founders Company. We've dedicated ourselves to improving the island to bring more tourists in and have invested a good deal of money in various projects, including the mall construction."

"So...……..what's the issue?" Erin asked.

"It's the tree in the picture," the businesswoman responded, "according to this woman it's existed for several hundred years and she refuses to let us cut it down. She's chained herself up to the tree to prevent any workers from coming through. We can't even get her to negotiate with us to see if there's a way to build the mall and allow the tree to remain. And we need her signature on this...…"

Reaching into her briefcase again, she removed a clip board which she handed over to Erin.

"This is the contract signed by all members of the Founders Company agreeing to building of the mall. There are thirteen members, but we only have twelve signatures. Brenna is the thirteenth member of the Founders Company board. Without her signature...…..the construction company won't start. We need unanimous consent."

"So..........what do you want me to do?"

"Well...….......the tree she's protecting is a quarter mile from here. I've been canvassing the homes nearby to see if anybody knows her and can go down and talk to her. Talk sense to her. Every house I've been to has refused. Yours is the last one. Will you be able to help us?"

Erin thought in silence for a few moments. She was still tired from her journey and though she respected Brenna and was friends with her, she did not have any desire to get involved.

"Sorry," she said after a while, "I don't think she'll listen to me. She's nice but when it comes to stuff like this...…….she's not open to compromise."

The businesswoman sighed and took the clipboard back.

"I understand," she said, returning the clipboard to the suitcase, "it was a fools errand. Well, I'd hoped to have somebody intervene before my boss and I speak with her tonight."

Erin shot her a suspicious glance.

"What do you mean?"

"Oh my boss and I plan to meet with her tonight. Kind of an ambush meeting. We'd hoped to have someone else talk her down. My boss can be kind of ruthless."

Clicking her briefcase shut, the businesswoman bid Erin farewell.

"Anyway.............enjoy your night ma'am."

The businesswoman turned and walked back down the driveway. Erin closed the door and stood in silence for a few moments.

After a few seconds, she decided to............................
12323.title: A woman in a business suit

123231.content:
…………………...wait until the sunset before she went to warn Brenna.

Sneaking out the backdoor, Erin slipped into a pathway in the woods and began to make her way to the tree.

From the photo, Erin deduced that the tree would be in the back of Cosquillas Island Park, which was easily accessible through the woods.

After a few moments of walking, guided by a small flashlight, Erin reached a clearing into Cosquillas Island Park.

Off a few yards in the distance, she saw a few bright lights.

"That has to be Brenna," she thought.

Crouching low, she made her way towards the light, hoping she wasn't too late.

Suddenly she stopped.

A noise hit her ears. It was...……………….
123231.title: Warn Brenna

1232311.content:
……………………….someone laughing hysterically.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAH NOT THAT HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH STOP STOP HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH!"

Erin crouched low and moved closer to the scene.

From behind a high set of shrubs, Erin could see the predicament below.

Brenna was still chained to the tree, only now her arms were interlocked behind her. There was blindfold over her eyes and she was shaking her head side to side in laughter.

The bright light that Erin saw was from an SUV that was positioned a few yards from the tree. It's headlights were shone on the helpless ticklish hippie woman. Erin could see the silhouette of a woman in front of the SUV but not make out her features.

Looking closer, Erin could see the source of Brenna's laughter.

The businesswoman that had been to Erin's house was tickling her on her...……………………...

13.content:
The lights of the amusement park drew the eye before anything else on the island.

The amusement park was open year round and was actually one of the major tourism focuses on the island, the attractions were swaped out each year to give guests reason to come back, a feature which fit her schedule perfectly.

Of course the fair wasn't like a normal amusement park, nothing is ever quite normal on Cosquillas after all. The populations tickle happy leanings have effected all stages of the park: tickle booths, stockades, tickle coasters, and any other tickle themed fair attractions the eccentric owner Mr. man could think to engineer.

The year after she started her tradition of going to Cosquillas Erin had made a report on the park with help from Mr. Man and the employees of the park, earning her a temporary backstage pass which she managed to get extended indefinitely, allowing her to get a proper look at the live running of the various contraptions and even participate in ways only the employees normally could.

As such a great variation of people from all walks of life and all forms of deviation attended, the park took up the atmosphere of a music festival with somewhat more sexual liberty. Everyone knew why they were there and what was intended of them, so many social expectation were laxxed. This required Mr. Man to go against his anarchic ideals and hire a security force to ensure no unwanted harassment happened.

Of course such a location was still known for its distinctly sexual atmosphere, and attendees could opt for a pass which indicated interest in the more blatantly sexual themes and optional parts of attractions. However a surprising amount of attendees were more like gawkers at a nudist beach, hardly brave enough to participate in Cosquillas' favorite pass time, let alone involve anything clearly sexual. These people rarely stayed at Cosquillas for more than a single trip, which has lead to the fair being more of a unintentional tourist trap, much to Mr. Man's disappointment.

This has lead to Erin getting to know both the employees and the regulars, most of whom attend the fair multiple times or even live on the island itself. As such the awkwardness of Mr. Man's decision to have many of his attractions require mandatory exhibitionism somewhat fades away after the third visit or so in much the same way of the exhibitionist meet ups on the mainland which allow a safe feeling exploration of the experience. Of course Erin still felt rather humiliated when she uses one of Mr. Man's machines that arn't labled as such.

The park is built on a long stretch of plains which gently slopes down to the beach. The tents and shacks and rides are tightly packed along wide roads, allowing room to maneuver but also transforming the park into somewhat of a labyrinth from ground level. The attractions are set up in a tiered system, the further from the entrance at the top of the plains or the beach at the bottom the more intense they are. Erin enjoyed those central attractions since she knew everyone who used them, but there were quite a few others on display here and there that she wanted to try out that were new since her last visit.

She'll have to visit Mr. Man at some point to get information on an re-examination she's making over the summer, but since his office is in the dead center of the park she can just work her way towards him. In the mean time the large gates and ticket booths stand before her waiting, its time for her to decide on what type of pass she'll get.
13.title: Head to the amusement park

132.content:
(Note: This Chapter Is Part Of An Experiment, If I Haven't Sent You A Message By A Few Days, Please Edit The Parts In Parenthesis Out)

Erin walked over to the special ticket booth and noticed that the same ticket booth attendant from last year sat behind the booths glass. A mere trickle of attendees headed through this way compared to the moderately busy lines going through the normal lines. The attractions in the center of the park were locked by another gate where you had to present your special pass to get in, there an entirely different atmosphere was present, one much more in line with Mr. Man's original conception of the park and the only place where his mad ingenuity ran truly wild. Erin decided that she was going to head through the normal areas down the hill, stop by the center to check what was new, then head to Mr. Man and decide on her future plans based on what he needed.

The man behind the counter handed her the pass before glancing back at the computer then to the ID she had handed her, "Erin huh? Good to see you again, Mr. Man has a note here that says to send you to the clothing station backstage before you head anywhere else" The man stamped a small key card, slotted it into a lanyard and handed it over to her. He signaled for her to carry on and received the only person in line behind her. Stepping through the turn-still she took a moment to take in the small segmented off area before heading into the site proper.

The special pass holders entered the park through a secondary gate after the turn still, and before it were the changing rooms on one side and a small booth explaining further details on what special privileges and expectations pass holders were expected to up hold. Erin decided to learn what was new this year with the pass and went to the kiosk first.

She recognized the lady manning the kiosk from last year, a girl named Kim who she had run into in the inner center of the park who had lost all but her underwear in one of Mr. Man's more devious devices and had needed Erin's help to get a towel to use. Kim waved her over and clicked a counter, today seemed to have a little under 5 dozen pass holders come through.

"Hey Erin, Great to see you! Wasn't sure you'd be coming by this year!"

"You too, I had no clue that you worked here!"

Kim shook her head, "I started volunteering to help this winter during the off season, Mr. Man lets me hold the pass for free in exchange for a few hours a week. Anyways, i'm sure you'd love to hear whats going on with the park since you left huh? I've picked up on a few tid-bits not included in any of the leaflets"

"Of course, hit me."

"Alright," She pulled out a rolled up paper and unfurled it,
"New Theme this year, "Exhibition/Voyeurism" Attractions to embarrass, tease, and titillate!
On Site hotel with special pass holder area - More info on site
Under Ground Arena, See Sam for more info"
"A few of those attraction are pretty intense, but you should be able to handle it. They don't have any markings on what they each do, so good luck with that. Mr. Man is at the top floor of the hotel, and said that I should tell you to test out the arena before sending you up to him. I haven't been there yet but apparently its some pretty 'Eyes Wide Shut' level shit, a bit over my head so I haven't headed down there yet, you can find it by a spiral staircase at the center of the inner ring."
"Anyways, Im heading out in a few, so you'll probably see me in there at some point, catch you then!"
Erin responded affirmatively, and...
132.title: Special

info.brief_description: A reporter and photographer is taking her summer on a remote island.
info.description:
This story follows the adventures of Erin Packard, a report and photographer for the Mason City Times. She is working remotely for the summer months from Cosquillas Island, her favorite vacation spot.

During her time, Erin encounters various residents and has a variety of tickle adventures.
